2230      /**
2231       * Template function: Provide link to message form for this Item's author.
2232       *
2233       * @param string url of the message form
2234       * @param string to display before link
2235       * @param string to display after link
2236       * @param string link text
2237       * @param string link title
2238       * @param string class name
2239       * @return boolean true, if a link was displayed; false if there's no email address for the Item's author.
2240       */
2241  	function msgform_link( $params = array() )
2242      {
2243          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
2244          $params = array_merge( array(
2245                  'before'      => ' ',
2246                  'after'       => ' ',
2247                  'text'        => '#',
2248                  'title'       => '#',
2249                  'class'       => '',
2250                  'format'      => 'htmlbody',
2251                  'form_url'    => '#current_blog#',
2252              ), $params );
2253  
2254  
2255          if( $params['form_url'] == '#current_blog#' )
2256          {    // Get
2257              global $Blog;
2258              $params['form_url'] = $Blog->get('msgformurl');
2259          }
2260  
2261          $this->get_creator_User();
2262          $redirect_to = url_add_param( $params['form_url'], 'post_id='.$this->ID.'&recipient_id='.$this->creator_User->ID, '&' );
2263          $params['form_url'] = $this->creator_User->get_msgform_url( url_add_param( $params['form_url'], 'post_id='.$this->ID ), $redirect_to );
2264  
2265          if( empty( $params['form_url'] ) )
2266          {
2267              return false;
2268          }
2269  
2270          if( $params['title'] == '#' )
2271          {
2272              if( $this->creator_User->get_msgform_possibility() == 'email' )
2273              {
2274                  $params['title'] = T_('Send email to post author');
2275              }
2276              else
2277              {
2278                  $params['title'] = T_('Send message to post author');
2279              }
2280          }
2281          if( $params['text'] == '#' ) $params['text'] = get_icon( 'email', 'imgtag', array( 'class' => 'middle', 'title' => $params['title'] ) );
2282  
2283          echo $params['before'];
2284          echo '<a href="'.$params['form_url'].'" title="'.$params['title'].'"';
2285          if( !empty( $params['class'] ) ) echo ' class="'.$params['class'].'"';
2286          echo ' rel="nofollow">'.$params['text'].'</a>';
2287          echo $params['after'];
2288  
2289          return true;
2290      }

2293      /**
2294       * Template function: Provide link to message form for this Item's assigned User.
2295       *
2296       * @param string url of the message form
2297       * @param string to display before link
2298       * @param string to display after link
2299       * @param string link text
2300       * @param string link title
2301       * @param string class name
2302       * @return boolean true, if a link was displayed; false if there's no email address for the assigned User.
2303       */
2304  	function msgform_link_assigned( $form_url, $before = ' ', $after = ' ', $text = '#', $title = '#', $class = '' )
2305      {
2306          if( ! $this->get_assigned_User() || empty($this->assigned_User->email) )
2307          { // We have no email for this Author :(
2308              return false;
2309          }
2310  
2311          $form_url = url_add_param( $form_url, 'recipient_id='.$this->assigned_User->ID );
2312          $form_url = url_add_param( $form_url, 'post_id='.$this->ID );
2313  
2314          if( $title == '#' ) $title = T_('Send email to assigned user');
2315          if( $text == '#' ) $text = get_icon( 'email', 'imgtag', array( 'class' => 'middle', 'title' => $title ) );
2316  
2317          echo $before;
2318          echo '<a href="'.$form_url.'" title="'.$title.'"';
2319          if( !empty( $class ) ) echo ' class="'.$class.'"';
2320          echo ' rel="nofollow">'.$text.'</a>';
2321          echo $after;
2322  
2323          return true;
2324      }

2327      /**
2328       * Display a link to pages for multi-page items
2329       *
2330       * @param array of params
2331       * @param string Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
2332       */
2333  	function page_links()
2334      {
2335          $num_args = func_num_args();
2336          $args = func_get_args();
2337  
2338          if( $num_args == 1 && is_array($args[0]) )
2339          {
2340              $params = $args[0];
2341              if( !isset($params['format']) ) $params['format'] = 'htmlbody';
2342          }
2343          else
2344          {    // Deprecated since v5, left for compatibility with old skins
2345              $params['before']        = isset($args[0]) ? $args[0] : '<p class="right">'.T_('Pages:').' ';
2346              $params['after']        = isset($args[1]) ? $args[1] : '</p>';
2347              $params['separator']    = isset($args[2]) ? $args[2] : ' ';
2348              $params['single']        = isset($args[3]) ? $args[3] : '';
2349              $params['current_page']    = isset($args[4]) ? $args[4] : '#';
2350              $params['pagelink']        = isset($args[5]) ? $args[5] : '%d';
2351              $params['url']            = isset($args[6]) ? $args[6] : '';
2352              $params['format']        = 'htmlbody';
2353          }
2354  
2355          echo $this->get_page_links( $params, $params['format'] );
2356      }
2357  
2358  
2359      /**
2360       * Get a link to pages for multi-page items
2361       *
2362       * @param array of params
2363       * @param string Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
2364       */
2365  	function get_page_links( $params = array(), $format = 'htmlbody' )
2366      {
2367          $params = array_merge( array(
2368                      'before'       => '<p class="right">'.T_('Pages:').' ',
2369                      'after'        => '</p>',
2370                      'separator'    => ' ',
2371                      'single'       => '',
2372                      'current_page' => '#',
2373                      'pagelink'     => '%d',
2374                      'url'          => '',
2375                  ), $params );
2376  
2377          global $disp;
2378  
2379          // Make sure, the pages are split up:
2380          $this->split_pages();
2381  
2382          if( $this->pages <= 1 )
2383          { // Single page:
2384              return $params['single'];
2385          }
2386  
2387          if( $params['separator'] == NULL )
2388          { // Don't display pages
2389              if( $params['before'] !== NULL )
2390              {
2391                  return format_to_output( $params['before'].$params['after'], $format );
2392              }
2393              return;
2394          }
2395  
2396          if( $params['current_page'] == '#' )
2397          {
2398              global $page;
2399              $params['current_page'] = $page;
2400          }
2401  
2402          if( empty($params['url']) )
2403          {
2404              $params['url'] = $this->get_permanent_url( '', '', '&amp;' );
2405          }
2406  
2407          $page_links = array();
2408  
2409          $page_prev_i = $params['current_page'] - 1;
2410          $page_next_i = $params['current_page'] + 1;
2411          for( $i = 1; $i <= $this->pages; $i++ )
2412          {
2413              $text = str_replace('%d', $i, $params['pagelink']);
2414  
2415              if( $i != $params['current_page'] )
2416              {
2417                  $attr_rel = '';
2418                  if( $disp == 'single' || $disp == 'page' )
2419                  { // Add rel="prev|next" only on single post view
2420                      if( $page_prev_i == $i )
2421                      {
2422                          $attr_rel = ' rel="prev"';
2423                      }
2424                      elseif( $page_next_i == $i )
2425                      {
2426                          $attr_rel = ' rel="next"';
2427                      }
2428                  }
2429  
2430                  if( $i == 1 )
2431                  {    // First page special:
2432                      $page_links[] = '<a href="'.$params['url'].'"'.$attr_rel.'>'.$text.'</a>';
2433                  }
2434                  else
2435                  {
2436                      $page_links[] = '<a href="'.url_add_param( $params['url'], 'page='.$i ).'"'.$attr_rel.'>'.$text.'</a>';
2437                  }
2438              }
2439              else
2440              {
2441                  $page_links[] = $text;
2442              }
2443          }
2444  
2445          $r = $params['before'].implode( $params['separator'], $page_links ).$params['after'];
2446  
2447          return format_to_output( $r, $format );
2448      }
2449  
2450  
2451      /**
2452       * Get an attached image tag with lightbox reference
2453       *
2454       * @private function
2455       *
2456       * @param object the attached image Link
2457       * @param array params
2458       * @return string the attached image tag
2459       */
2460  	function get_attached_image_tag( $Link, $params )
2461      {
2462          // Make sure $link_to is set
2463          $link_to = isset( $params['image_link_to'] ) ? $params['image_link_to'] : 'original';
2464  
2465          if( $link_to == 'single' )
2466          { // We're linking to the post (displayed on a single post page):
2467              $link_to = $this->get_permanent_url( $link_to );
2468              $link_title = $this->title;
2469              $link_rel = isset( $params['image_link_rel'] ) ? $params['image_link_rel'] : '';
2470          }
2471          else
2472          { // We're linking to the original image, let lighbox (or clone) quick in:
2473              $link_title = empty( $params['image_link_title'] ) ? '#title#' : $params['image_link_title'];    // This title will be used by lightbox (colorbox for instance)
2474              $link_rel = isset( $params['image_link_rel'] ) ? $params['image_link_rel'] : 'lightbox[p'.$this->ID.']';    // Make one "gallery" per post.
2475          }
2476  
2477          // Generate the IMG tag with all the alt, title and desc if available
2478          return $Link->get_tag( array_merge( $params, array(
2479                      'image_link_to'    => $link_to,
2480                      'image_link_title' => $link_title,
2481                      'image_link_rel'   => $link_rel,
2482                      'image_alt'        => $this->title,
2483                  ) ) );
2484      }
2485  
2486  
2487      /**

2493  	function images( $params = array(), $format = 'htmlbody' )

2499      /**
2500       * Get block of images linked to the current Item
2501       *
2502       * @param array of params
2503       * @param string Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
2504       */
2505  	function get_images( $params = array(), $format = 'htmlbody' )
2506      {
2507          global $Plugins;
2508  
2509          $r = '';
2510  
2511          $params = array_merge( array(
2512                  'before'                     => '<div>',
2513                  'before_image'               => '<div class="image_block">',
2514                  'before_image_legend'        => '<div class="image_legend">',
2515                  'after_image_legend'         => '</div>',
2516                  'after_image'                => '</div>',
2517                  'after'                      => '</div>',
2518                  'image_size'                 => 'fit-720x500',
2519                  'image_size_x'               => 1, // Use '2' to build 2x sized thumbnail that can be used for Retina display
2520                  'image_link_to'              => 'original', // Can be 'original' (image) or 'single' (this post)
2521                  'limit'                      => 1000, // Max # of images displayed
2522                  'before_gallery'             => '<div class="bGallery">',
2523                  'after_gallery'              => '</div>',
2524                  'gallery_image_size'         => 'crop-80x80',
2525                  'gallery_image_limit'        => 1000,
2526                  'gallery_colls'              => 5,
2527                  'gallery_order'              => '', // 'ASC', 'DESC', 'RAND'
2528                  'restrict_to_image_position' => 'teaser,aftermore', // 'teaser'|'aftermore'|'inline'|'albumart'
2529                  'data'                       =>  & $r,
2530                  'get_rendered_attachments'   => true,
2531                  'links_sql_select'           => '',
2532                  'links_sql_orderby'          => 'link_order',
2533              ), $params );
2534  
2535          // Get list of ALL attached files
2536          $links_params = array(
2537                  'sql_select_add' => $params['links_sql_select'],
2538                  'sql_order_by'   => $params['links_sql_orderby']
2539              );
2540          $LinkOwner = new LinkItem( $this );
2541          if( ! $LinkList = $LinkOwner->get_attachment_LinkList( 1000, $params['restrict_to_image_position'], NULL, $links_params ) )
2542          {
2543              return '';
2544          }
2545  
2546          $galleries = array();
2547          $image_counter = 0;
2548          $plugin_render_attachments = false;
2549          while( $image_counter < $params['limit'] && $Link = & $LinkList->get_next() )
2550          {
2551              if( ! ( $File = & $Link->get_File() ) )
2552              { // No File object
2553                  global $Debuglog;
2554                  $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'Link ID#%d of item #%d does not have a file object!', $Link->ID, $this->ID ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
2555                  continue;
2556              }
2557  
2558              if( ! $File->exists() )
2559              { // File doesn't exist
2560                  global $Debuglog;
2561                  $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'File linked to item #%d does not exist (%s)!', $this->ID, $File->get_full_path() ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
2562                  continue;
2563              }
2564  
2565              $params['File'] = $File;
2566              $params['Link'] = $Link;
2567              $params['Item'] = $this;
2568  
2569              if( $File->is_dir() && $params['gallery_image_limit'] > 0 )
2570              { // This is a directory/gallery
2571                  if( ( $gallery = $File->get_gallery( $params ) ) != '' )
2572                  { // Got gallery code
2573                      $galleries[] = $gallery;
2574                  }
2575                  continue;
2576              }
2577  
2578              if( ! $params['get_rendered_attachments'] )
2579              { // Save $r to temp var in order to don't get the rendered data from plugins
2580                  $temp_r = $r;
2581              }
2582  
2583              $temp_params = $params;
2584              foreach( $params as $param_key => $param_value )
2585              { // Pass all params by reference, in order to give possibility to modify them by plugin
2586                  // So plugins can add some data before/after image tags (E.g. used by infodots plugin)
2587                  $params[ $param_key ] = & $params[ $param_key ];
2588              }
2589  
2590              if( count( $Plugins->trigger_event_first_true( 'RenderItemAttachment', $params ) ) != 0 )
2591              { // Render attachments by plugin, Append the html content to $params['data'] and to $r
2592                  if( ! $params['get_rendered_attachments'] )
2593                  { // Restore $r value and mark this item has the rendered attachments
2594                      $r = $temp_r;
2595                      $plugin_render_attachments = true;
2596                  }
2597                  continue;
2598              }
2599  
2600              if( ! $File->is_image() )
2601              { // Skip anything that is not an image
2602                  // fp> TODO: maybe this property should be stored in link_ltype_ID
2603  
2604                  //$r .= $this->attachment_files($params);
2605                  continue;
2606              }
2607  
2608              // Generate the IMG tag with all the alt, title and desc if available
2609              $r .= $this->get_attached_image_tag( $Link, $params );
2610  
2611              $image_counter++;
2612              $params = $temp_params;
2613          }
2614  
2615          if( empty( $r ) && $plugin_render_attachments )
2616          { // This item doesn't contain the images but it has the rendered attachments by plugins
2617              $r .= 'plugin_render_attachments';
2618          }
2619  
2620          if( !empty($r) )
2621          {
2622              $r = $params['before'].$r.$params['after'];
2623  
2624              // Character conversions
2625              $r = format_to_output( $r, $format );
2626          }
2627  
2628          if( !empty($galleries) )
2629          { // Append galleries
2630              // sam2kb> It's done like that only until we figure out a better way to display galleries.
2631  
2632              /*
2633              sam2kb> TODO: use shortcode [gallery option1="value1" option2="value2"]
2634                  'columns' - table columns
2635                  'limit' - a number of images,
2636                  'size' - selected/large image size
2637                  'thumbsize' - thumbnails image size
2638                  'order' - files order ASC/DESC/RAND
2639              */
2640  
2641              // Character conversions
2642              $r .= "\n".format_to_output( implode("\n", $galleries), $format );
2643          }
2644  
2645          return $r;
2646      }
2647

2649      /**
2650       * Get a number of images linked to the current Item
2651       *
2652       * @param string Restrict to files/images linked to a specific position.
2653       *               Position can be 'teaser'|'aftermore'|'inline'
2654       *               Use comma as separator
2655       * @param integer Number of images
2656       */
2657  	function get_number_of_images( $image_position = NULL )
2658      {
2659          // Get list of attached files
2660          $LinkOwner = new LinkItem( $this );
2661          if( ! $LinkList = $LinkOwner->get_attachment_LinkList( 1000, $image_position ) )
2662          {
2663              return 0;
2664          }
2665  
2666          return $LinkList->result_num_rows;
2667      }

2681  
2682      /**
2683       * Get block of attachments/files linked to the current Item
2684       *
2685       * @param array Array of params
2686       * @param string Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
2687       * @return string HTML
2688       */
2689  	function get_files( $params = array(), $format = 'htmlbody' )
2690      {
2691          global $Plugins;
2692          $params = array_merge( array(
2693                  'before' =>              '<div class="item_attachments"><h3>'.T_('Attachments').':</h3><ul class="bFiles">',
2694                  'before_attach' =>         '<li>',
2695                  'before_attach_size' =>    '<span class="file_size">(',
2696                  'after_attach_size' =>     ')</span>',
2697                  'after_attach' =>          '</li>',
2698                  'after' =>               '</ul></div>',
2699              // fp> TODO: we should only have one limit param. Or is there a good reason for having two?
2700              // sam2kb> It's needed only for flexibility, in the meantime if user attaches 200 files he expects to see all of them in skin, I think.
2701                  'limit_attach' =>        1000, // Max # of files displayed
2702                  'limit' =>               1000,
2703                  'restrict_to_image_position' => '',    // Optionally restrict to files/images linked to specific position: 'teaser'|'aftermore'
2704                  'data'                       =>  '',
2705                  'attach_format'              => '$icon_link$ $file_link$ $file_size$', // $icon_link$ $icon$ $file_link$ $file_size$
2706                  'file_link_format'           => '$file_name$', // $icon$ $file_name$ $file_size$
2707                  'file_link_class'            => '',
2708                  'download_link_icon'         => 'download',
2709                  'download_link_title'        => T_('Download file'),
2710              ), $params );
2711  
2712          // Get list of attached files
2713          $LinkOwner = new LinkItem( $this );
2714          if( ! $LinkList = $LinkOwner->get_attachment_LinkList( $params['limit'], $params['restrict_to_image_position'] ) )
2715          {
2716              return '';
2717          }
2718  
2719          load_funcs('files/model/_file.funcs.php');
2720  
2721          $r = '';
2722          $i = 0;
2723          $r_file = array();
2724          /**
2725           * @var File
2726           */
2727          $File = NULL;
2728          while( ( $Link = & $LinkList->get_next() ) && $params['limit_attach'] > $i )
2729          {
2730              if( ! ( $File = & $Link->get_File() ) )
2731              { // No File object
2732                  global $Debuglog;
2733                  $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'Link ID#%d of item #%d does not have a file object!', $Link->ID, $this->ID ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
2734                  continue;
2735              }
2736  
2737              if( ! $File->exists() )
2738              { // File doesn't exist
2739                  global $Debuglog;
2740                  $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'File linked to item #%d does not exist (%s)!', $this->ID, $File->get_full_path() ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
2741                  continue;
2742              }
2743  
2744              $params['File'] = $File;
2745              $params['Item'] = $this;
2746  
2747              $temp_params = $params;
2748              foreach( $params as $param_key => $param_value )
2749              { // Pass all params by reference, in order to give possibility to modify them by plugin
2750                  // So plugins can add some data before/after image tags (E.g. used by infodots plugin)
2751                  $params[ $param_key ] = & $params[ $param_key ];
2752              }
2753  
2754              if( count( $Plugins->trigger_event_first_true( 'RenderItemAttachment', $params ) ) != 0 )
2755              {
2756                  continue;
2757              }
2758  
2759              if( $File->is_image() )
2760              { // Skip images because these are displayed inline already
2761                  // fp> TODO: have a setting for each linked file to decide whether it should be displayed inline or as an attachment
2762                  continue;
2763              }
2764              elseif( $File->is_dir() )
2765              { // Skip directories/galleries
2766                  continue;
2767              }
2768  
2769              if( $File->is_audio() )
2770              { // Player for audio file:
2771                  $r_file[$i]  = '<div class="podplayer">';
2772                  $r_file[$i] .= $this->get_player( $File->get_url() );
2773                  $r_file[$i] .= '</div>';
2774                  $i++;
2775                  $params = $temp_params;
2776                  continue;
2777              }
2778  
2779              // A link to download a file:
2780  
2781              // Just icon with download icon
2782              $icon = ( $File->exists() && strpos( $params['attach_format'].$params['file_link_format'], '$icon$' ) !== false ) ?
2783                      get_icon( $params['download_link_icon'], 'imgtag', array( 'title' => $params['download_link_title'] ) ) : '';
2784  
2785              // A link with icon to download
2786              $icon_link = ( $File->exists() && strpos( $params['attach_format'], '$icon_link$' ) !== false ) ?
2787                      action_icon( $params['download_link_title'], $params['download_link_icon'], $File->get_url(), '', 5 ) : '';
2788  
2789              // File size info
2790              $file_size = ( $File->exists() && strpos( $params['attach_format'].$params['file_link_format'], '$file_size$' ) !== false ) ?
2791                      $params['before_attach_size'].bytesreadable( $File->get_size(), false, false ).$params['after_attach_size'] : '';
2792  
2793              // A link with file name to download
2794              $file_link_format = str_replace( array( '$icon$', '$file_name$', '$file_size$' ),
2795                  array( $icon, '$text$', $file_size ),
2796                  $params['file_link_format'] );
2797              if( $File->exists() )
2798              { // Get file link to download if file exists
2799                  $file_link = ( strpos( $params['attach_format'], '$file_link$' ) !== false ) ?
2800                          $File->get_view_link( $File->get_name(), NULL, NULL, $file_link_format, $params['file_link_class'], $Link->get_download_url() ) : '';
2801              }
2802              else
2803              { // File doesn't exist, We cannot display a link, Display only file name and warning
2804                  $file_link = ( strpos( $params['attach_format'], '$file_link$' ) !== false ) ?
2805                          $File->get_name().' - <span class="red nowrap">'.get_icon( 'warning_yellow' ).' '.T_('Missing attachment!').'</span>' : '';
2806              }
2807  
2808              $r_file[$i] = $params['before_attach'];
2809              $r_file[$i] .= str_replace( array( '$icon$', '$icon_link$', '$file_link$', '$file_size$' ),
2810                  array( $icon, $icon_link, $file_link, $file_size ),
2811                  $params['attach_format'] );
2812              $r_file[$i] .= $params['after_attach'];
2813  
2814              $i++;
2815              $params = $temp_params;
2816          }
2817  
2818          if( !empty($r_file) )
2819          {
2820              $r = $params['before'].implode( "\n", $r_file ).$params['after'];
2821  
2822              // Character conversions
2823              $r = format_to_output( $r, $format );
2824          }
2825  
2826          return $r;
2827      }
2828

2834  	function attachment_files( & $params/* = array()*/ )

2841

2843

2859      /**
2860       * Template function: Displays link to the feed for comments on this item
2861       *
2862       * @param string Type of feedback to link to (rss2/atom)
2863       * @param string String to display before the link (if comments are to be displayed)
2864       * @param string String to display after the link (if comments are to be displayed)
2865       * @param string Link title
2866       */
2867  	function feedback_feed_link( $skin = '_rss2', $before = '', $after = '', $title='#' )
2868      {
2869          if( ! $this->can_see_comments() )
2870          {    // Comments disabled
2871              return;
2872          }
2873  
2874          $this->load_Blog();
2875  
2876          if( $this->Blog->get_setting( 'comment_feed_content' ) == 'none' )
2877          {    // Comment feeds disabled
2878              return;
2879          }
2880  
2881          if( $title == '#' )
2882          {
2883              $title = get_icon( 'feed' ).' '.T_('Comment feed for this post');
2884          }
2885  
2886          $url = $this->get_feedback_feed_url($skin);
2887  
2888          echo $before;
2889          echo '<a href="'.$url.'">'.format_to_output($title).'</a>';
2890          echo $after;
2891      }

2896       *
2897       * @param string
2898       */
2899  	function get_feedback_feed_url( $skin_folder_name )
2900      {
2901          $this->load_Blog();
2902  
2903          return url_add_param( $this->Blog->get_tempskin_url( $skin_folder_name ), 'disp=comments&amp;p='.$this->ID );
2904      }

2934  
2935      /**
2936       * Get a link to feedback page (under some conditions)
2937       *
2938       * @param array
2939       */
2940  	function get_feedback_link( $params )
2941      {
2942          global $ReqURL;
2943  
2944          if( ! $this->can_see_comments() )
2945          {    // Comments disabled
2946              return;
2947          }
2948  
2949          $params = array_merge( array(
2950                                      'type' => 'feedbacks',        // Kind of feedbacks to count
2951                                      'status' => 'published',    // Status of feedbacks to count
2952                                      'link_before' => '',
2953                                      'link_after' => '',
2954                                      'link_text_zero' => '#',
2955                                      'link_text_one' => '#',
2956                                      'link_text_more' => '#',
2957                                      'link_anchor_zero' => '#',
2958                                      'link_anchor_one' => '#',
2959                                      'link_anchor_more' => '#',
2960                                      'link_title' => '#',
2961                                      'use_popup' => false,
2962                                      'show_in_single_mode' => false,        // Do we want to show this link even if we are viewing the current post in single view mode
2963                                      'url' => '#',
2964                                  ), $params );
2965  
2966          if( $params['show_in_single_mode'] == false && is_same_url( $this->get_permanent_url('','','&'), $ReqURL ) )
2967          {    // We are viewing the single page for this pos, which (typically) )contains comments, so we dpn't want to display this link
2968              return;
2969          }
2970  
2971          // dh> TODO:    Add plugin hook, where a Pingback plugin could hook and provide "pingbacks"
2972          switch( $params['type'] )
2973          {
2974              case 'feedbacks':
2975                  if( $params['link_title'] == '#' ) $params['link_title'] = T_('Display feedback / Leave a comment');
2976                  if( $params['link_text_zero'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_zero'] = T_('Send feedback').' &raquo;';
2977                  if( $params['link_text_one'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_one'] = T_('1 feedback').' &raquo;';
2978                  if( $params['link_text_more'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_more'] = T_('%d feedbacks').' &raquo;';
2979                  break;
2980  
2981              case 'comments':
2982                  if( $params['link_title'] == '#' ) $params['link_title'] = T_('Display comments / Leave a comment');
2983                  if( $params['link_text_zero'] == '#' )
2984                  {
2985                      if( $this->can_comment( NULL ) ) // NULL, because we do not want to display errors here!
2986                      {
2987                          $params['link_text_zero'] = T_('Leave a comment').' &raquo;';
2988                      }
2989                      else
2990                      {
2991                          $params['link_text_zero'] = '';
2992                      }
2993                  }
2994                  if( $params['link_text_one'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_one'] = T_('1 comment').' &raquo;';
2995                  if( $params['link_text_more'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_more'] = T_('%d comments').' &raquo;';
2996                  break;
2997  
2998              case 'trackbacks':
2999                  $this->get_Blog();
3000                  if( ! $this->can_receive_pings() )
3001                  { // Trackbacks not allowed on this blog:
3002                      return;
3003                  }
3004                  if( $params['link_title'] == '#' ) $params['link_title'] = T_('Display trackbacks / Get trackback address for this post');
3005                  if( $params['link_text_zero'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_zero'] = T_('Send a trackback').' &raquo;';
3006                  if( $params['link_text_one'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_one'] = T_('1 trackback').' &raquo;';
3007                  if( $params['link_text_more'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_more'] = T_('%d trackbacks').' &raquo;';
3008                  break;
3009  
3010              case 'pingbacks':
3011                  // Obsolete, but left for skin compatibility
3012                  $this->get_Blog();
3013                  if( ! $this->can_receive_pings() )
3014                  { // Trackbacks not allowed on this blog:
3015                      // We'll consider pingbacks to follow the same restriction
3016                      return;
3017                  }
3018                  if( $params['link_title'] == '#' ) $params['link_title'] = T_('Display pingbacks');
3019                  if( $params['link_text_zero'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_zero'] = T_('No pingback yet').' &raquo;';
3020                  if( $params['link_text_one'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_one'] = T_('1 pingback').' &raquo;';
3021                  if( $params['link_text_more'] == '#' ) $params['link_text_more'] = T_('%d pingbacks').' &raquo;';
3022                  break;
3023  
3024              default:
3025                  debug_die( "Unknown feedback type [{$params['type']}]" );
3026          }
3027  
3028          $link_text = $this->get_feedback_title( $params['type'], $params['link_text_zero'], $params['link_text_one'], $params['link_text_more'], $params['status'] );
3029  
3030          if( empty($link_text) )
3031          {    // No link, no display...
3032              return false;
3033          }
3034  
3035          if( $params['url'] == '#' )
3036          { // We want a link to single post:
3037              $params['url'] = $this->get_feedback_url();
3038          }
3039  
3040          // Anchor position
3041          $number = generic_ctp_number( $this->ID, $params['type'], $params['status'] );
3042  
3043          if( $number == 0 )
3044              $anchor = $params['link_anchor_zero'];
3045          elseif( $number == 1 )
3046              $anchor = $params['link_anchor_one'];
3047          elseif( $number > 1 )
3048              $anchor = $params['link_anchor_more'];
3049          if( $anchor == '#' )
3050          {
3051              $anchor = '#'.$params['type'];
3052          }
3053  
3054          $r = $params['link_before'];
3055  
3056          if( !empty( $params['url'] ) )
3057          {
3058              $r .= '<a href="'.$params['url'].$anchor.'" ';    // Position on feedback
3059              $r .= 'title="'.$params['link_title'].'"';
3060              if( $params['use_popup'] )
3061              { // Special URL if we can open a popup (i-e if JS is enabled):
3062                  $popup_url = url_add_param( $params['url'], 'disp=feedback-popup' );
3063                  $r .= ' onclick="return pop_up_window( \''.$popup_url.'\', \'evo_comments\' )"';
3064              }
3065              $r .= '>';
3066              $r .= $link_text;
3067              $r .= '</a>';
3068          }
3069          else
3070          {
3071              $r .= $link_text;
3072          }
3073  
3074          $r .= $params['link_after'];
3075  
3076          return $r;
3077      }

3080      /**
3081       * Return true if there is any feedback of given type.
3082       *
3083       * @param array
3084       * @return boolean
3085       */
3086  	function has_feedback( $params )
3087      {
3088          $params = array_merge( array(
3089                              'type' => 'feedbacks',
3090                              'status' => 'published'
3091                          ), $params );
3092  
3093          // Check is a given type is allowed
3094          switch( $params['type'] )
3095          {
3096              case 'feedbacks':
3097              case 'comments':
3098              case 'trackbacks':
3099              case 'pingbacks':
3100                  break;
3101              default:
3102                  debug_die( "Unknown feedback type [{$params['type']}]" );
3103          }
3104  
3105          $number = generic_ctp_number( $this->ID, $params['type'], $params['status'] );
3106  
3107          return $number > 0;
3108      }

3112       * Return true if trackbacks and pingbacks are allowed
3113       *
3114       * @return boolean
3115       */
3116  	function can_receive_pings()
3117      {
3118          $this->load_Blog();
3119          return $this->Blog->get( 'allowtrackbacks' ) && $this->can_comment( NULL );
3120      }

3123      /**
3124       * Get text depending on number of comments
3125       *
3126       * @param string Type of feedback to link to (feedbacks (all)/comments/trackbacks/pingbacks)
3127       * @param string Link text to display when there are 0 comments
3128       * @param string Link text to display when there is 1 comment
3129       * @param string Link text to display when there are >1 comments (include %d for # of comments)
3130       * @param string Status of feedbacks to count
3131       */
3132  	function get_feedback_title( $type = 'feedbacks',    $zero = '#', $one = '#', $more = '#', $status = 'published', $filter_by_perm = true )
3133      {
3134          if( ! $this->can_see_comments() )
3135          {    // Comments disabled
3136              return NULL;
3137          }
3138  
3139          // dh> TODO:    Add plugin hook, where a Pingback plugin could hook and provide "pingbacks"
3140          switch( $type )
3141          {
3142              case 'feedbacks':
3143                  if( $zero == '#' ) $zero = '';
3144                  if( $one == '#' ) $one = T_('1 feedback');
3145                  if( $more == '#' ) $more = T_('%d feedbacks');
3146                  break;
3147  
3148              case 'comments':
3149                  if( $zero == '#' ) $zero = '';
3150                  if( $one == '#' ) $one = T_('1 comment');
3151                  if( $more == '#' ) $more = T_('%d comments');
3152                  break;
3153  
3154              case 'trackbacks':
3155                  if( $zero == '#' ) $zero = '';
3156                  if( $one == '#' ) $one = T_('1 trackback');
3157                  if( $more == '#' ) $more = T_('%d trackbacks');
3158                  break;
3159  
3160              case 'pingbacks':
3161                  // Obsolete, but left for skin compatibility
3162                  if( $zero == '#' ) $zero = '';
3163                  if( $one == '#' ) $one = T_('1 pingback');
3164                  if( $more == '#' ) $more = T_('%d pingbacks');
3165                  break;
3166  
3167              default:
3168                  debug_die( "Unknown feedback type [$type]" );
3169          }
3170  
3171          $number = generic_ctp_number( $this->ID, $type, $status, false, $filter_by_perm );
3172          if( !$filter_by_perm )
3173          { // This is the case when we are only counting comments awaiting moderation, return only not visible feedbacks number
3174              // count feedbacks with the same statuses where user has permission
3175              $visible_number = generic_ctp_number( $this->ID, $type, $status, false, true );
3176              $number = $number - $visible_number;
3177          }
3178  
3179          if( $number == 0 )
3180              return $zero;
3181          elseif( $number == 1 )
3182              return $one;
3183          elseif( $number > 1 )
3184              return str_replace( '%d', $number, $more );
3185      }

3188      /**
3189       * Get table from ratings data
3190       *
3191       * @param array ratings data
3192       * @param array params
3193       */
3194  	function get_rating_table( $ratings, $params )
3195      {
3196          $ratings_count = $ratings['all_ratings'];
3197          $average_real = ( $ratings_count > 0 ) ? number_format( $ratings["summary"] / $ratings_count, 1, ".", "" ) : 0;
3198          $average = ceil( ( $average_real ) / 5 * 100 );
3199  
3200          $table = '<table class="rating_summary" cellspacing="1">';
3201          foreach ( $ratings as $r => $count )
3202          {    // Print a row for each star with formed data
3203              if( !is_int($r) )
3204              {
3205                  continue;
3206              }
3207  
3208              $star_average = ( $ratings_count > 0 ) ? ceil( ( $count / $ratings_count ) * 100 ) : 0;
3209              switch( $params['rating_summary_star_totals'] )
3210              {
3211                  case 'count':
3212                      $star_value = '('.$count.')';
3213                  break;
3214                  case 'percent':
3215                      $star_value = '('.$star_average.'%)';
3216                  break;
3217                  case 'none':
3218                  default:
3219                      $star_value = "";
3220                  break;
3221              }
3222              $table .= '<tr><th>'.$r.' '.T_('star').':</th>
3223                  <td class="progress"><div style="width:'.$star_average.'%">&nbsp;</div></td>
3224                  <td>'.$star_value.'</td><tr>';
3225          }
3226          $table .= '</table>';
3227  
3228          $table .= '<div class="rating_summary_total">
3229              '.$ratings_count.' '.( $ratings_count > 1 ? T_('ratings') : T_('rating') ).'
3230              <div class="average_rating">'.T_('Average user rating').':<br />
3231              '.get_star_rating( $average_real ).'<span>('.$average_real.')</span>
3232              </div></div><div class="clear"></div>';
3233  
3234          return $table;
3235      }
3236  
3237  
3238      /**
3239       * Get table with rating summary
3240       *
3241       * @param array of params
3242       */
3243  	function get_rating_summary( $params = array() )
3244      {
3245          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3246          $params = array_merge( array(
3247              'rating_summary_star_totals' => 'count' // Possible values: 'count', 'percent' and 'none'
3248          ), $params );
3249  
3250          // get ratings and active ratings ( active ratings are younger then post_expiry_delay )
3251          list( $ratings, $active_ratings ) = $this->get_ratings();
3252          $ratings_count = $ratings['all_ratings'];
3253          $active_ratings_count = $active_ratings['all_ratings'];
3254          if( $ratings_count == 0 )
3255          {    // No Comments
3256              return NULL;
3257          }
3258  
3259          $average_real = number_format( $ratings["summary"] / $ratings_count, 1, ".", "" );
3260          $active_average_real = ( $active_ratings_count == 0 ) ? 0 : ( number_format( $active_ratings["summary"] / $active_ratings_count, 1, ".", "" ) );
3261  
3262          $result = '<table class="ratings_table" cellspacing="2">';
3263          $result .= '<tr>';
3264          $expiry_delay = $this->get_setting( 'post_expiry_delay' );
3265          if( empty( $expiry_delay ) )
3266          {
3267              $all_ratings_title = T_('User ratings');
3268          }
3269          else
3270          {
3271              $all_ratings_title = T_('Overall user ratings');
3272              $result .= '<td><div><strong>'.get_duration_title( $expiry_delay ).'</strong></div>';
3273              $result .= $this->get_rating_table( $active_ratings, $params );
3274              $result .= '</td>';
3275              $result .= '<td width="2px"></td>';
3276          }
3277  
3278          $result .= '<td><div><strong>'.$all_ratings_title.'</strong></div>';
3279          $result .= $this->get_rating_table( $ratings, $params );
3280          $result .= '</td>';
3281          $result .= '</tr></table>';
3282  
3283          return $result;
3284      }

3287      /**
3288       * Template function: Displays feeback moderation info
3289       *
3290       * @param string Type of feedback to link to (feedbacks (all)/comments/trackbacks/pingbacks)
3291       * @param string String to display before the link (if comments are to be displayed)
3292       * @param string String to display after the link (if comments are to be displayed)
3293       * @param string Link text to display when there are 0 comments
3294       * @param string Link text to display when there is 1 comment
3295       * @param string Link text to display when there are >1 comments (include %d for # of comments)
3296       * @param string Link
3297       * @param boolean true to hide if no feedback
3298       */
3299  	function feedback_moderation( $type = 'feedbacks', $before = '', $after = '',
3300              $zero = '', $one = '#', $more = '#', $edit_comments_link = '#', $params = array() )
3301      {
3302          /**
3303           * @var User
3304           */
3305          global $current_User;
3306  
3307          /* TODO: finish this...
3308          $params = array_merge( array(
3309                                      'type' => 'feedbacks',
3310                                      'block_before' => '',
3311                                      'blo_after' => '',
3312                                      'link_text_zero' => '#',
3313                                      'link_text_one' => '#',
3314                                      'link_text_more' => '#',
3315                                      'link_title' => '#',
3316                                      'use_popup' => false,
3317                                      'url' => '#',
3318                                      'type' => 'feedbacks',
3319                                  ), $params );
3320          */
3321  
3322          if( isset($current_User) &&    $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_comment!draft', 'moderate', false, $this->get_blog_ID() ) )
3323          {    // We have permission to edit comments:
3324              if( $edit_comments_link == '#' )
3325              {    // Use default link:
3326                  global $admin_url;
3327                  $edit_comments_link = '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$this->get_blog_ID().'&amp;p='.$this->ID.'#comments" title="'.T_('Moderate these feedbacks').'">'.get_icon( 'edit' ).' '.T_('Moderate...').'</a>';
3328              }
3329          }
3330          else
3331          { // User has no right to edit comments:
3332              $edit_comments_link = '';
3333          }
3334  
3335          // Inject Edit/moderate link as relevant:
3336          $zero = str_replace( '%s', $edit_comments_link, $zero );
3337          $one = str_replace( '%s', $edit_comments_link, $one );
3338          $more = str_replace( '%s', $edit_comments_link, $more );
3339  
3340          $r = $this->get_feedback_title( $type, $zero, $one, $more, array( 'draft', 'review' ), false );
3341  
3342          if( !empty( $r ) )
3343          {
3344              echo $before.$r.$after;
3345          }
3346      }

3350      /**
3351       * Template tag: display footer for the current Item.
3352       *
3353       * @param array
3354       * @return boolean true if something has been displayed
3355       */
3356  	function footer( $params )
3357      {
3358          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3359          $params = array_merge( array(
3360                  'mode'        => '#',                // Will detect 'single' from $disp automatically
3361                  'block_start' => '<div class="item_footer">',
3362                  'block_end'   => '</div>',
3363                  'format'      => 'htmlbody',
3364              ), $params );
3365  
3366          if( $params['mode'] == '#' )
3367          {
3368              global $disp;
3369              $params['mode'] = $disp;
3370          }
3371  
3372          // pre_dump( $params['mode'] );
3373  
3374          $this->get_Blog();
3375          switch( $params['mode'] )
3376          {
3377              case 'xml':
3378                  $text = $this->Blog->get_setting( 'xml_item_footer_text' );
3379                  break;
3380  
3381              case 'single':
3382                  $text = $this->Blog->get_setting( 'single_item_footer_text' );
3383                  break;
3384  
3385              default:
3386                  // Do NOT display!
3387                  $text = '';
3388          }
3389  
3390          $text = preg_replace_callback( '#\$([a-z_]+)\$#', array( $this, 'replace_callback' ), $text );
3391  
3392          if( empty($text) )
3393          {
3394              return false;
3395          }
3396  
3397          echo format_to_output( $params['block_start'].$text.$params['block_end'], $params['format'] );
3398  
3399          return true;
3400      }

3403      /**
3404       * Gets button for deleting the Item if user has proper rights
3405       *
3406       * @param string to display before link
3407       * @param string to display after link
3408       * @param string link text
3409       * @param string link title
3410       * @param string class name
3411       * @param boolean true to make this a button instead of a link
3412       * @param string page url for the delete action
3413       * @param string confirmation text
3414       */
3415  	function get_delete_link( $before = ' ', $after = ' ', $text = '#', $title = '#', $class = '', $button = false, $actionurl = '#', $confirm_text = '#', $redirect_to = '' )
3416      {
3417          global $current_User, $admin_url;
3418  
3419          if( ! is_logged_in( false ) ) return false;
3420  
3421          if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'delete', false, $this ) )
3422          { // User has right to delete this post
3423              return false;
3424          }
3425  
3426          if( $text == '#' )
3427          {
3428              if( ! $button )
3429              {
3430                  $text = get_icon( 'delete', 'imgtag' ).' '.T_('Delete!');
3431              }
3432              else
3433              {
3434                  $text = T_('Delete!');
3435              }
3436          }
3437  
3438          if( $title == '#' ) $title = T_('Delete this post');
3439  
3440          if( $actionurl == '#' )
3441          {
3442              $actionurl = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=delete&amp;post_ID=';
3443          }
3444          $url = $actionurl.$this->ID.'&amp;'.url_crumb('item');
3445  
3446          if( !empty( $redirect_to ) )
3447          {
3448              $url = $url.'&amp;redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $redirect_to );
3449          }
3450  
3451          if( $confirm_text == '#' )
3452          {
3453              $confirm_text = TS_('You are about to delete this post!\\nThis cannot be undone!');
3454          }
3455  
3456          $r = $before;
3457          if( $button )
3458          { // Display as button
3459              $r .= '<input type="button"';
3460              $r .= ' value="'.$text.'" title="'.$title.'" onclick="if ( confirm(\'';
3461              $r .= $confirm_text;
3462              $r .= '\') ) { document.location.href=\''.$url.'\' }"';
3463              if( !empty( $class ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$class.'"';
3464              $r .= '/>';
3465          }
3466          else
3467          { // Display as link
3468              $r .= '<a href="'.$url.'" title="'.$title.'" onclick="return confirm(\'';
3469              $r .= $confirm_text;
3470              $r .= '\')"';
3471              if( !empty( $class ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$class.'"';
3472              $r .= '>'.$text.'</a>';
3473          }
3474          $r .= $after;
3475  
3476          return $r;
3477      }

3498      /**
3499       * Provide link to copy a post if user has edit rights
3500       *
3501       * @param array Params:
3502       *  - 'before': to display before link
3503       *  - 'after':    to display after link
3504       *  - 'text': link text
3505       *  - 'title': link title
3506       *  - 'class': CSS class name
3507       *  - 'save_context': redirect to current URL?
3508       */
3509  	function get_copy_link( $params = array() )
3510      {
3511          global $current_User, $admin_url;
3512  
3513          $actionurl = $this->get_copy_url($params);
3514          if( ! $actionurl )
3515          {
3516              return false;
3517          }
3518  
3519          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
3520          $params = array_merge( array(
3521                  'before'       => ' ',
3522                  'after'        => ' ',
3523                  'text'         => '#', // '#' - icon + text, '#icon#' - only icon, '#text#' - only text
3524                  'title'        => '#',
3525                  'class'        => '',
3526                  'save_context' => true,
3527              ), $params );
3528  
3529          switch( $params['text'] )
3530          {
3531              case '#':
3532                  $params['text'] = get_icon( 'copy', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => T_('Duplicate this post...') ) ).' '.T_('Duplicate...');
3533                  break;
3534  
3535              case '#icon#':
3536                  $params['text'] = get_icon( 'copy', 'imgtag', array( 'title' => T_('Duplicate this post...') ) );
3537                  break;
3538  
3539              case '#text#':
3540                  $params['text'] = T_('Duplicate...');
3541                  break;
3542          }
3543  
3544          if( $params['title'] == '#' ) $params['title'] = T_('Duplicate this post...');
3545  
3546          $r = $params['before'];
3547          $r .= '<a href="'.$actionurl;
3548          $r .= '" title="'.$params['title'].'"';
3549          if( !empty( $params['class'] ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$params['class'].'"';
3550          $r .=  '>'.$params['text'].'</a>';
3551          $r .= $params['after'];
3552  
3553          return $r;
3554      }

3557      /**
3558       * Get URL to copy a post if user has edit rights.
3559       *
3560       * @param array Params:
3561       *  - 'save_context': redirect to current URL?
3562       */
3563  	function get_copy_url( $params = array() )
3564      {
3565          global $admin_url, $current_User;
3566  
3567          if( ! is_logged_in( false ) ) return false;
3568  
3569          if( ! $this->ID )
3570          { // preview..
3571              return false;
3572          }
3573  
3574          $this->load_Blog();
3575          $write_item_url = $this->Blog->get_write_item_url();
3576          if( empty( $write_item_url ) )
3577          { // User has no right to copy this post
3578              return false;
3579          }
3580  
3581          // default params
3582          $params += array('save_context' => true);
3583  
3584          $url = false;
3585          if( $this->Blog->get_setting( 'in_skin_editing' ) && !is_admin_page() )
3586          {    // We have a mode 'In-skin editing' for the current Blog
3587              if( check_item_perm_edit( 0, false ) )
3588              {    // Current user can copy this post from Front-office
3589                  $url = url_add_param( $this->Blog->get( 'url' ), 'disp=edit&cp='.$this->ID );
3590              }
3591              else if( $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'restricted' ) )
3592              {    // Current user can copy this post from Back-office
3593                  $url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=copy&amp;blog='.$this->Blog->ID.'&amp;p='.$this->ID;
3594              }
3595          }
3596          else if( $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'restricted' ) )
3597          {    // Copy a post from Back-office
3598              $url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=copy&amp;blog='.$this->Blog->ID.'&amp;p='.$this->ID;
3599              if( $params['save_context'] )
3600              {
3601                  $url .= '&amp;redirect_to='.rawurlencode( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ).'#'.$this->get_anchor_id() );
3602              }
3603          }
3604          return $url;
3605      }

3670  	function get_edit_url($params = array())

3677          { // preview..

3679          }
3680  
3681          if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'edit', false, $this ) )
3682          { // User has no right to edit this post
3683              return false;
3684          }
3685  
3686          // default params
3687          $params += array('save_context' => true);
3688  
3689          $this->load_Blog();
3690          $url = false;
3691          if( $this->Blog->get_setting( 'in_skin_editing' ) && ! is_admin_page() )
3692          {    // We have a mode 'In-skin editing' for the current Blog
3693              if( check_item_perm_edit( $this->ID, false ) )
3694              {    // Current user can edit this post
3695                  $url = url_add_param( $this->Blog->get( 'url' ), 'disp=edit&p='.$this->ID );
3696              }
3697          }
3698          else if( $current_User->check_perm( 'admin', 'restricted' ) )
3699          {    // Edit a post from Back-office
3700              $url = $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;action=edit&amp;p='.$this->ID;
3701              if( $params['save_context'] )
3702              {
3703                  $url .= '&amp;redirect_to='.rawurlencode( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ).'#'.$this->get_anchor_id() );
3704              }
3705          }
3706          return $url;
3707      }

3714  	function edit_link( $params = array() )

3720      /**
3721       * Get next status to publish/restrict to this item
3722       * TODO: asimo>Refactor this with Comment->get_next_status()
3723       *
3724       * @param boolean true to get next publish status, and false to get next restrict status
3725       * @return mixed false if user has no permission | array( status, status_text, icon_color ) otherwise
3726       */
3727  	function get_next_status( $publish )
3728      {
3729          global $current_User;
3730  
3731          if( !is_logged_in( false ) )
3732          {
3733              return false;
3734          }
3735  
3736          $status_order = get_visibility_statuses( 'ordered-array' );
3737          $status_index = get_visibility_statuses( 'ordered-index' );
3738  
3739          $curr_index = $status_index[$this->status];
3740          if( ( !$publish ) && ( $curr_index == 0 ) && ( $this->status != 'deprecated' ) )
3741          {
3742              $curr_index = $curr_index + 1;
3743          }
3744          $has_perm = false;
3745          while( !$has_perm && ( $publish ? ( $curr_index < 4 ) : ( $curr_index > 0 ) ) )
3746          {
3747              $curr_index = $publish ? ( $curr_index + 1 ) : ( $curr_index - 1 );
3748              $has_perm = $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!'.$status_order[$curr_index][0], 'moderate', false, $this );
3749          }
3750          if( $has_perm )
3751          {
3752              $label_index = $publish ? 1 : 2;
3753              return array( $status_order[$curr_index][0], $status_order[$curr_index][$label_index], $status_order[$curr_index][3] );
3754          }
3755          return false;
3756      }

3759      /**
3760       * Provide link to publish a post if user has edit rights
3761       *
3762       * Note: publishing date will be updated
3763       *
3764       * @param string to display before link
3765       * @param string to display after link
3766       * @param string link text
3767       * @param string link title
3768       * @param string class name
3769       * @param string glue between url params
3770       */
3771  	function get_publish_link( $before = ' ', $after = ' ', $text = '#', $title = '#', $class = '', $glue = '&amp;', $save_context = true )
3772      {
3773          global $current_User, $admin_url;
3774  
3775          if( $this->status != 'draft' )
3776          {
3777              return false;
3778          }
3779  
3780          if( ! is_logged_in( false ) ) return false;
3781  
3782          $this->load_Blog();
3783          if( ! ($current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!published', 'edit', false, $this ))
3784              || ! ($current_User->check_perm( 'blog_edit_ts', 'edit', false, $this->Blog->ID ) ) )
3785          { // User has no right to publish this post now:
3786              return false;
3787          }
3788  
3789          if( $text == '#' ) $text = get_icon( 'publish', 'imgtag' ).' '.T_('Publish NOW!');
3790          if( $title == '#' ) $title = T_('Publish now using current date and time.');
3791  
3792          $r = $before;
3793          $r .= '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=items'.$glue.'action=publish_now'.$glue.'post_ID='.$this->ID.$glue.url_crumb('item');
3794          if( $save_context )
3795          {
3796              $r .= $glue.'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ) );
3797          }
3798          $r .= '" title="'.$title.'"';
3799          if( !empty( $class ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$class.'"';
3800          $r .= '>'.$text.'</a>';
3801          $r .= $after;
3802  
3803          return $r;
3804      }

3807      /**
3808       * Provide link to publish a post to the highest available public status for the current User
3809       *
3810       * @param $params
3811       * @return boolean true if link was displayed false otherwise
3812       */
3813  	function highest_publish_link( $params = array() )
3814      {
3815          global $current_User, $admin_url;
3816  
3817          if( !is_logged_in( false ) )
3818          {
3819              return false;
3820          }
3821  
3822          $params = array_merge( array(
3823                  'before'       => '',
3824                  'after'        => '',
3825                  'text'         => '#',
3826                  'before_text'  => '',
3827                  'after_text'   => '',
3828                  'title'        => '',
3829                  'class'        => '',
3830                  'glue'         => '&amp;',
3831                  'save_context' => true,
3832                  'redirect_to'  => '',
3833              ), $params );
3834  
3835          $curr_status_permvalue = get_status_permvalue( $this->status );
3836          // get the current User highest publish status for this item Blog
3837          list( $highest_status, $publish_text ) = get_highest_publish_status( 'post', $this->get_blog_ID() );
3838          // Get binary value of the highest available status
3839          $highest_status_permvalue = get_status_permvalue( $highest_status );
3840          if( $curr_status_permvalue >= $highest_status_permvalue || ( $highest_status_permvalue <= get_status_permvalue( 'private' ) ) )
3841          { // Current User has no permission to change this comment status to a more public status
3842              return false;
3843          }
3844  
3845          if( ! ($current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!'.$highest_status, 'edit', false, $this ) ) )
3846          { // User has no right to edit this post
3847              return false;
3848          }
3849  
3850          $glue = $params[ 'glue' ];
3851          $text = ( $params[ 'text' ] == '#' ) ? $publish_text : $params[ 'text' ];
3852  
3853          $r = $params[ 'before' ];
3854          $r .= '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=items'.$glue.'action=publish'.$glue.'post_status='.$highest_status.$glue.'post_ID='.$this->ID.$glue.url_crumb('item');
3855          if( $params[ 'redirect_to' ] )
3856          {
3857              $r .= $glue.'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $params[ 'redirect_to' ] );
3858          }
3859          elseif( $params[ 'save_context' ] )
3860          {
3861              $r .= $glue.'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( regenerate_url( '', '', '', '&' ) );
3862          }
3863          $r .= '" title="'.$params[ 'title' ].'"';
3864          if( !empty( $params[ 'class' ] ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$params[ 'class' ].'"';
3865          $r .= '>'.$params[ 'before_text' ].$text.$params[ 'after_text' ].'</a>';
3866          $r .= $params[ 'after' ];
3867  
3868          echo $r;
3869          return true;
3870      }

3873  	function publish_link( $before = ' ', $after = ' ', $text = '#', $title = '#', $class = '', $glue = '&amp;', $save_context = true )
3874      {
3875          $publish_link = $this->get_publish_link( $before, $after, $text, $title, $class, $glue, $save_context );
3876  
3877          if( $publish_link === false )
3878          {    // The publish link is unavailable for current user and for this item
3879              return false;
3880          }
3881  
3882          // Display the publish link
3883          echo $publish_link;
3884  
3885          return true;
3886      }

3889      /**
3890       * Display next Publish/Restrict to link
3891       *
3892       * @param array link params
3893       * @param boolean true to display next publish status, and false to display next restrict status link
3894       * @return boolean true if link was displayed | false otherwise
3895       */
3896  	function next_status_link( $params, $publish )
3897      {
3898          global $admin_url;
3899  
3900          $params = array_merge( array(
3901                  'before'      => '',
3902                  'after'       => '',
3903                  'before_text' => '',
3904                  'after_text'  => '',
3905                  'text'        => '#',
3906                  'title'       => '',
3907                  'class'       => '',
3908                  'glue'        => '&amp;',
3909                  'redirect_to' => '',
3910                  'post_navigation' => 'same_blog',
3911                  'nav_target'  => NULL,
3912              ), $params );
3913  
3914          if( $publish )
3915          {
3916              $next_status_in_row = $this->get_next_status( true );
3917              $action = 'publish';
3918              $button_default_icon = 'move_up_'.$next_status_in_row[2];
3919          }
3920          else
3921          {
3922              $next_status_in_row =  $this->get_next_status( false );
3923              $action = 'restrict';
3924              $button_default_icon = 'move_down_'.$next_status_in_row[2];
3925          }
3926  
3927          if( $next_status_in_row === false )
3928          { // Next status is not allowed for current user
3929              return false;
3930          }
3931  
3932          $next_status = $next_status_in_row[0];
3933          $next_status_label = $next_status_in_row[1];
3934  
3935          if( isset( $params['text_'.$next_status] ) )
3936          { // Set text from params for next status
3937              $text = $params['text_'.$next_status];
3938          }
3939          elseif( $params['text' ] != '#' )
3940          { // Set text from params for any atatus
3941              $text = $params['text'];
3942          }
3943          else
3944          { // Default text
3945              $text = get_icon( $button_default_icon, 'imgtag', array( 'title' => '' ) ).' '.$next_status_label;
3946          }
3947  
3948          if( empty( $params['title'] ) )
3949          {
3950              $status_title = get_visibility_statuses( 'moderation-titles' );
3951              $params['title'] = $status_title[$next_status];
3952          }
3953          $glue = $params['glue'];
3954  
3955          $r = $params['before'];
3956          $r .= '<a href="'.$admin_url.'?ctrl=items'.$glue.'action='.$action.$glue.'post_status='.$next_status.$glue.'post_ID='.$this->ID.$glue.url_crumb('item');
3957  
3958          // set redirect_to
3959          $redirect_to = $params['redirect_to'];
3960          if( empty( $redirect_to ) && ( !is_admin_page() ) )
3961          { // we are in front office
3962              if( $next_status == 'deprecated' )
3963              {
3964                  if( $params['post_navigation'] == 'same_category' )
3965                  {
3966                      $redirect_to = get_caturl( $params['nav_target'] );
3967                  }
3968                  else
3969                  {
3970                      $this->get_Blog();
3971                      $redirect_to = $this->Blog->gen_blogurl();
3972                  }
3973              }
3974              else
3975              {
3976                  $redirect_to = $this->add_navigation_param( $this->get_permanent_url(), $params['post_navigation'], $params['nav_target'] );
3977              }
3978          }
3979          if( !empty( $redirect_to ) )
3980          {
3981              $r .= $glue.'redirect_to='.rawurlencode( $redirect_to );
3982          }
3983  
3984          $r .= '" title="'.$params['title'].'"';
3985          if( empty( $params['class_'.$next_status] ) )
3986          { // Set class for all statuses
3987              $class = empty( $params['class'] ) ? '' : $params['class'];
3988          }
3989          else
3990          { // Set special class for next status
3991              $class = $params['class_'.$next_status];
3992          }
3993          if( !empty( $class ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$class.'"';
3994          $r .= '>'.$params['before_text'].$text.$params['after_text'].'</a>';
3995          $r .= $params['after'];
3996  
3997          echo $r;
3998          return true;
3999      }

4117       * Get status of item
4118       *
4119       * Statuses:
4120       * - published
4121       * - deprecated
4122       * - protected
4123       * - private
4124       * - draft
4125       *
4126       * @param array Params
4127       */
4128  	function get_status( $params = array() )
4129      {
4130          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
4131          $params = array_merge( array(
4132                  'before' => '',
4133                  'after'  => '',
4134                  'format' => 'htmlbody', // Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
4135              ), $params );
4136  
4137          $r = $params['before'];
4138  
4139          switch( $params['format'] )
4140          {
4141              case 'raw':
4142                  $r .= $this->get_status_raw();
4143                  break;
4144  
4145              case 'styled':
4146                  $r .= get_styled_status( $this->status, $this->get('t_status') );
4147                  break;
4148  
4149              default:
4150                  $r .= format_to_output( $this->get('t_status'), $params['format'] );
4151                  break;
4152          }
4153  
4154          $r .= $params['after'];
4155  
4156          return $r;
4157      }

4254       /**
4255       * Display tags for Item
4256       *
4257       * @param array of params
4258       * @param string Output format, see {@link format_to_output()}
4259       */
4260  	function tags( $params = array() )
4261      {
4262          global $evo_charset;
4263  
4264          $params = array_merge( array(
4265                  'before' =>           '<div>'.T_('Tags').': ',
4266                  'after' =>            '</div>',
4267                  'separator' =>        ', ',
4268                  'links' =>            true,
4269              ), $params );
4270  
4271          $tags = $this->get_tags();
4272  
4273          if( !empty( $tags ) )
4274          {
4275              echo $params['before'];
4276  
4277              if( $links = $params['links'] )
4278              {
4279                  $this->get_Blog();
4280              }
4281  
4282              $i = 0;
4283              foreach( $tags as $tag )
4284              {
4285                  if( $i++ > 0 )
4286                  {
4287                      echo $params['separator'];
4288                  }
4289  
4290                  if( $links )
4291                  {    // We want links
4292                      echo $this->Blog->get_tag_link( $tag );
4293                  }
4294                  else
4295                  {
4296                      echo evo_htmlspecialchars( $tag, NULL, $evo_charset );
4297                  }
4298              }
4299  
4300              echo $params['after'];
4301          }
4302      }

4305      /**
4306       * Template function: Displays trackback autodiscovery information
4307       *
4308       * TODO: build into headers
4309       */
4310  	function trackback_rdf()
4311      {
4312          $this->get_Blog();
4313          if( ! $this->can_receive_pings() )
4314          { // Trackbacks not allowed on this blog:
4315              return;
4316          }
4317  
4318          echo '<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" '."\n";
4319          echo '  xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"'."\n";
4320          echo '  xmlns:trackback="http://madskills.com/public/xml/rss/module/trackback/">'."\n";
4321          echo '<rdf:Description'."\n";
4322          echo '  rdf:about="';
4323          $this->permanent_url( 'single' );
4324          echo '"'."\n";
4325          echo '  dc:identifier="';
4326          $this->permanent_url( 'single' );
4327          echo '"'."\n";
4328          $this->title( array(
4329              'before'    => ' dc:title="',
4330              'after'     => '"'."\n",
4331              'link_type' => 'none',
4332              'format'    => 'xmlattr',
4333              ) );
4334          echo '  trackback:ping="';
4335          $this->trackback_url();
4336          echo '" />'."\n";
4337          echo '</rdf:RDF>';
4338      }

4376          return '<object classid="clsid:d27cdb6e-ae6d-11cf-96b8-444553540000" codebase="http://fpdownload.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=7,0,0,0" width="200" height="20" id="dewplayer" align="middle"><param name="wmode" value="transparent"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="sameDomain" /><param name="movie" value="'.$rsc_url.'swf/dewplayer.swf?mp3='.$url.'&amp;showtime=1" /><param name="quality" value="high" /><param name="bgcolor" value="" /><embed src="'.$rsc_url.'swf/dewplayer.swf?mp3='.$url.'&amp;showtime=1" quality="high" bgcolor="" width="200" height="20" name="dewplayer" wmode="transparent" align="middle" allowScriptAccess="sameDomain" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></embed></object>';

4380      /**
4381       * Template function: Display link to item related url.
4382       *
4383       * By default the link is displayed as a link.
4384       * Optionally some smart stuff may happen.
4385       */
4386  	function url_link( $params = array() )
4387      {
4388  
4389          if( empty( $this->url ) )
4390          {
4391              return;
4392          }
4393  
4394          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
4395          $params = array_merge( array(
4396                  'before'        => ' ',
4397                  'after'         => ' ',
4398                  'text_template' => '$url$',        // If evaluates to empty, nothing will be displayed (except player if podcast)
4399                  'url_template'  => '$url$',
4400                  'target'        => '',
4401                  'format'        => 'htmlbody',
4402                  'podcast'       => '#',                        // handle as podcast. # means depending on post type
4403                  'before_podplayer' => '<div class="podplayer">',
4404                  'after_podplayer'  => '</div>',
4405              ), $params );
4406  
4407          if( $params['podcast'] == '#' )
4408          {    // Check if this post is a podcast
4409              $params['podcast'] = ( $this->ptyp_ID == 2000 );
4410          }
4411  
4412          if( $params['podcast'] && $params['format'] == 'htmlbody' )
4413          {    // We want podcast display:
4414  
4415              echo $params['before_podplayer'];
4416  
4417              echo $this->get_player( $this->url );
4418  
4419              echo $params['after_podplayer'];
4420  
4421          }
4422          else
4423          { // Not displaying podcast player:
4424  
4425              $text = str_replace( '$url$', $this->url, $params['text_template'] );
4426              if( empty($text) )
4427              {    // Nothing to display
4428                  return;
4429              }
4430  
4431              $r = $params['before'];
4432  
4433              $r .= '<a href="'.str_replace( '$url$', $this->url, $params['url_template'] ).'"';
4434  
4435              if( !empty( $params['target'] ) )
4436              {
4437                  $r .= ' target="'.$params['target'].'"';
4438              }
4439  
4440              $r .= '>'.$text.'</a>';
4441  
4442              $r .= $params['after'];
4443  
4444              echo format_to_output( $r, $params['format'] );
4445          }
4446      }

4497      /**
4498       * Set param value
4499       *
4500       * By default, all values will be considered strings
4501       *
4502       * @todo extra_cat_IDs recording
4503       *
4504       * @param string parameter name
4505       * @param mixed parameter value
4506       * @param boolean true to set to NULL if empty value
4507       * @return boolean true, if a value has been set; false if it has not changed
4508       */
4509  	function set( $parname, $parvalue, $make_null = false )
4510      {
4511          switch( $parname )
4512          {
4513              case 'pst_ID':
4514                  return $this->set_param( $parname, 'number', $parvalue, true );
4515  
4516              case 'content':
4517                  $r1 = $this->set_param( 'content', 'string', $parvalue, $make_null );
4518                  // Update wordcount as well:
4519                  $r2 = $this->set_param( 'wordcount', 'number', bpost_count_words($this->content), false );
4520                  return ( $r1 || $r2 ); // return true if one changed
4521  
4522              case 'wordcount':
4523              case 'featured':
4524                  return $this->set_param( $parname, 'number', $parvalue, false );
4525  
4526              case 'datedeadline':
4527                  return $this->set_param( 'datedeadline', 'date', $parvalue, true );
4528  
4529              case 'order':
4530                  return $this->set_param( 'order', 'number', $parvalue, true );
4531  
4532              case 'renderers': // deprecated
4533                  return $this->set_renderers( $parvalue );
4534  
4535              case 'excerpt':
4536                  if( $this->excerpt_autogenerated )
4537                  {    // Check if the excerpt needs to keep getting autogenerated...
4538                      $autovalue = $this->get_autogenerated_excerpt();
4539                      $post_excerpt_previous_md5 = param('post_excerpt_previous_md5', 'string');
4540                      // TODO: this is itemform specific and should not be like that.
4541                      if( $post_excerpt_previous_md5 == md5($parvalue) || empty($post_excerpt_previous_md5) /* empty in simple form */ )
4542                      { // old value has not changed, it keeps getting autogenerated:
4543                          $parvalue = $autovalue;
4544                      }
4545                  }
4546  
4547                  if( parent::set( 'excerpt', $parvalue, $make_null ) )
4548                  { // mark excerpt as not being autogenerated anymore, if user has changed it from the autogenerated value.
4549                      if( isset($autovalue) && $parvalue != $autovalue )
4550                      {
4551                          $this->set('excerpt_autogenerated', 0);
4552                      }
4553                  }
4554                  break;
4555  
4556              default:
4557                  return parent::set( $parname, $parvalue, $make_null );
4558          }
4559      }

4610
