4622      /**
4623       * Create a new Item/Post and insert it into the DB
4624       *
4625       * This function has to handle all needed DB dependencies!
4626       *
4627       * @deprecated Use set() + dbinsert() instead
4628       */
4629  	function insert(
4630          $author_user_ID,              // Author
4631          $post_title,
4632          $post_content,
4633          $post_timestamp,              // 'Y-m-d H:i:s'
4634          $main_cat_ID = 1,             // Main cat ID
4635          $extra_cat_IDs = array(),     // Table of extra cats
4636          $post_status = 'published',
4637          $post_locale = '#',
4638          $post_urltitle = '',
4639          $post_url = '',
4640          $post_comment_status = 'open',
4641          $post_renderers = array('default'),
4642          $item_typ_ID = 1,
4643          $item_st_ID = NULL,
4644          $post_order = NULL )
4645      {
4646          global $DB, $query, $UserCache;
4647          global $default_locale;
4648  
4649          if( $post_locale == '#' ) $post_locale = $default_locale;
4650  
4651          // echo 'INSERTING NEW POST ';
4652  
4653          if( isset( $UserCache ) )    // DIRTY HACK
4654          { // If not in install procedure...
4655              $this->set_creator_User( $UserCache->get_by_ID( $author_user_ID ) );
4656          }
4657          else
4658          {
4659              $this->set( $this->creator_field, $author_user_ID );
4660          }
4661          $this->set( $this->lasteditor_field, $this->{$this->creator_field} );
4662          $this->set( 'title', $post_title );
4663          $this->set( 'urltitle', $post_urltitle );
4664          $this->set( 'content', $post_content );
4665          $this->set( 'datestart', $post_timestamp );
4666  
4667          $this->set( 'main_cat_ID', $main_cat_ID );
4668          $this->set( 'extra_cat_IDs', $extra_cat_IDs );
4669          $this->set( 'status', $post_status );
4670          $this->set( 'locale', $post_locale );
4671          $this->set( 'url', $post_url );
4672          $this->set( 'comment_status', $post_comment_status );
4673          $this->set_renderers( $post_renderers );
4674          $this->set( 'ptyp_ID', $item_typ_ID );
4675          $this->set( 'pst_ID', $item_st_ID );
4676          $this->set( 'order', $post_order );
4677  
4678          // INSERT INTO DB:
4679          $this->dbinsert();
4680  
4681          return $this->ID;
4682      }

4685      /**
4686       * Insert object into DB based on previously recorded changes
4687       *
4688       * @param string Source of item creation ( 'through_admin', 'through_xmlrpc', 'through_email' )
4689       * @return boolean true on success
4690       */
4691  	function dbinsert( $created_through = 'through_admin' )
4692      {
4693          global $DB, $current_User, $Plugins;
4694  
4695          $DB->begin( 'SERIALIZABLE' );
4696  
4697          if( $this->status != 'draft' )
4698          {    // The post is getting published in some form, set the publish date so it doesn't get auto updated in the future:
4699              $this->set( 'dateset', 1 );
4700          }
4701  
4702          if( empty($this->creator_user_ID) )
4703          { // No creator assigned yet, use current user:
4704              $this->set_creator_User( $current_User );
4705          }
4706  
4707          // Create new slug with validated title
4708          $new_Slug = new Slug();
4709          $new_Slug->set( 'title', urltitle_validate( $this->urltitle, $this->title, $this->ID, false, $new_Slug->dbprefix.'title', $new_Slug->dbprefix.'itm_ID', $new_Slug->dbtablename, $this->locale ) );
4710          $new_Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
4711          $this->set( 'urltitle', $new_Slug->get( 'title' ) );
4712  
4713          $this->update_renderers_from_Plugins();
4714  
4715          $this->update_excerpt();
4716  
4717          if( isset($Plugins) )
4718          {    // Note: Plugins may not be available during maintenance, install or test cases
4719              // TODO: allow a plugin to cancel update here (by returning false)?
4720              $Plugins->trigger_event( 'PrependItemInsertTransact', $params = array( 'Item' => & $this ) );
4721          }
4722  
4723          global $localtimenow;
4724          $this->set_param( 'last_touched_ts', 'date', date('Y-m-d H:i:s',$localtimenow) );
4725  
4726          $dbchanges = $this->dbchanges; // we'll save this for passing it to the plugin hook
4727  
4728          if( $result = parent::dbinsert() )
4729          { // We could insert the item object..
4730  
4731              // Let's handle the extracats:
4732              $result = $this->insert_update_extracats( 'insert' );
4733  
4734              if( $result )
4735              { // Let's handle the tags:
4736                  $this->insert_update_tags( 'insert' );
4737              }
4738  
4739              // save Item settings
4740              if( $result && isset( $this->ItemSettings ) && isset( $this->ItemSettings->cache[0] ) )
4741              {
4742                  // update item ID in the ItemSettings cache
4743                  $this->ItemSettings->cache[$this->ID] = $this->ItemSettings->cache[0];
4744                  unset( $this->ItemSettings->cache[0] );
4745  
4746                  $this->ItemSettings->dbupdate();
4747              }
4748  
4749              if( $result )
4750              {
4751                  modules_call_method( 'update_item_after_insert', array( 'edited_Item' => $this ) );
4752              }
4753  
4754              // Let's handle the slugs:
4755              // set slug item ID:
4756              $new_Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
4757  
4758              // Create tiny slug:
4759              $new_tiny_Slug = new Slug();
4760              load_funcs( 'slugs/model/_slug.funcs.php' );
4761              $tinyurl = getnext_tinyurl();
4762              $new_tiny_Slug->set( 'title', $tinyurl );
4763              $new_tiny_Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
4764              $new_tiny_Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
4765  
4766              if( $result && ( $result = ( $new_Slug->dbinsert() && $new_tiny_Slug->dbinsert() ) ) )
4767              {
4768                  $this->set( 'canonical_slug_ID', $new_Slug->ID );
4769                  $this->set( 'tiny_slug_ID', $new_tiny_Slug->ID );
4770                  if( $result = parent::dbupdate() )
4771                  {
4772                      $DB->commit();
4773  
4774                      // save the last tinyurl
4775                      global $Settings;
4776                      $Settings->set( 'tinyurl', $tinyurl );
4777                      $Settings->dbupdate();
4778  
4779                      if( isset($Plugins) )
4780                      {    // Note: Plugins may not be available during maintenance, install or test cases
4781                          $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterItemInsert', $params = array( 'Item' => & $this, 'dbchanges' => $dbchanges ) );
4782                      }
4783                  }
4784              }
4785          }
4786  
4787          if( ! $result )
4788          {    // Rollback current transaction
4789              $DB->rollback();
4790          }
4791          else
4792          {    // Log a creating of new item on success result
4793              log_new_item_create( $created_through );
4794          }
4795  
4796          return $result;
4797      }
4798

4800      /**
4801       * Insert new item in test mode, Use this function only in test tool to create very much items at one time
4802       *
4803       * @return boolean true on success
4804       */
4805  	function dbinsert_test()
4806      {
4807          global $DB, $localtimenow;
4808  
4809          $this->set_param( 'last_touched_ts', 'date', date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s', $localtimenow ) );
4810  
4811          $DB->begin( 'SERIALIZABLE' );
4812  
4813          if( $result = parent::dbinsert() )
4814          { // We could insert the item object..
4815  
4816              if( ! is_null( $this->extra_cat_IDs ) )
4817              { // Insert new extracats:
4818                  $query = 'INSERT INTO T_postcats ( postcat_post_ID, postcat_cat_ID ) VALUES ';

4820                  {
4821                      $query .= '( '.$this->ID.', '.$extra_cat_ID.' ),';
4822                  }
4823                  $query = substr( $query, 0, strlen( $query ) - 1 );
4824                  $DB->query( $query, 'insert new extracats' );
4825              }
4826  
4827              // Create canonical slug with urltitle
4828              $canonical_Slug = new Slug();
4829              $canonical_Slug->set( 'title', $this->urltitle );
4830              $canonical_Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
4831              $canonical_Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
4832  
4833              // Create tiny slug:
4834              $tiny_Slug = new Slug();
4835              load_funcs( 'slugs/model/_slug.funcs.php' );
4836              $tinyurl = getnext_tinyurl();
4837              $tiny_Slug->set( 'title', $tinyurl );
4838              $tiny_Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
4839              $tiny_Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
4840

4843                  $this->set( 'canonical_slug_ID', $canonical_Slug->ID );
4844                  $this->set( 'tiny_slug_ID', $tiny_Slug->ID );
4845                  if( $result = parent::dbupdate() )
4846                  { // save the last tinyurl
4847                      global $Settings;
4848                      $Settings->set( 'tinyurl', $tinyurl );
4849                      $Settings->dbupdate();
4850                  }
4851              }
4852          }
4853  
4854          if( $result )
4855          { // The post and all related object was successfully created
4856              $DB->commit();
4857          }
4858          else
4859          { // Some error occured the transaction needs to be rollbacked
4860              $DB->rollback();
4861          }
4862  
4863          return $result;
4864      }

4867      /**
4868       * Update the DB based on previously recorded changes
4869       *
4870       * @param boolean do we want to auto track the mod date?
4871       * @param boolean Update slug? - We want to PREVENT updating slug when item dbupdate is called,
4872       *     because of the item canonical url title was changed on the slugs edit form, so slug update is already done.
4873       *  If slug update wasn't done already, then this param has to be true.
4874       * @param boolean Update excerpt? - We want to PREVENT updating exerpts when the item content wasn't changed ( e.g. only item canonical slug was changed )
4875       * @return boolean true on success
4876       */
4877  	function dbupdate( $auto_track_modification = true, $update_slug = true, $update_excerpt = true )
4878      {
4879          global $DB, $Plugins;
4880  
4881          $DB->begin( 'SERIALIZABLE' );
4882  
4883          if( $this->status != 'draft' )
4884          {    // The post is getting published in some form, set the publish date so it doesn't get auto updated in the future:
4885              $this->set( 'dateset', 1 );
4886          }
4887  
4888          // save Item settings
4889          if( isset( $this->ItemSettings ) )
4890          {
4891              $this->ItemSettings->dbupdate();
4892          }
4893  
4894          // validate url title / slug
4895          if( $update_slug )
4896          { // item canonical slug wasn't updated outside from this call, if it was changed or it wasn't set yet, we must update the slugs
4897              if( empty( $this->urltitle ) || isset( $this->dbchanges['post_urltitle'] )  )
4898              { // Url title has changed or is empty, we do need to update the slug:
4899                  $edited_slugs = $this->update_slugs();
4900              }
4901          }
4902  
4903          $this->update_renderers_from_Plugins();
4904  
4905          if( $update_excerpt )
4906          {    // We want to update the excerpt:
4907              $this->update_excerpt();
4908          }
4909  
4910          // TODO: dh> allow a plugin to cancel update here (by returning false)?
4911          $Plugins->trigger_event( 'PrependItemUpdateTransact', $params = array( 'Item' => & $this ) );
4912  
4913          $dbchanges = $this->dbchanges; // we'll save this for passing it to the plugin hook
4914  
4915          // pre_dump($this->dbchanges);
4916          // fp> note that dbchanges isn't actually 100% accurate. At this time it does include variables that actually haven't changed.
4917          if( isset($this->dbchanges['post_status'])
4918              || isset($this->dbchanges['post_title'])
4919              || isset($this->dbchanges['post_content']) )
4920          {    // One of the fields we track in the revision history has changed:
4921              // Save the "current" (soon to be "old") data as a version before overwriting it in parent::dbupdate:
4922              // fp> TODO: actually, only the fields that have been changed should be copied to the version, the other should be left as NULL
4923  
4924              // Get next version ID
4925              $iver_SQL = new SQL();
4926              $iver_SQL->SELECT( 'MAX( iver_ID )' );
4927              $iver_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__version' );
4928              $iver_SQL->WHERE( 'iver_itm_ID = '.$this->ID );
4929              $iver_ID = (int)$DB->get_var( $iver_SQL->get() ) + 1;
4930  
4931              $sql = 'INSERT INTO T_items__version( iver_ID, iver_itm_ID, iver_edit_user_ID, iver_edit_datetime, iver_status, iver_title, iver_content )
4932                  SELECT "'.$iver_ID.'" AS iver_ID, post_ID, post_lastedit_user_ID, post_datemodified, post_status, post_title, post_content
4933                      FROM T_items__item
4934                   WHERE post_ID = '.$this->ID;
4935              $DB->query( $sql, 'Save a version of the Item' );
4936          }
4937  
4938          if( $auto_track_modification && ( count( $dbchanges ) > 0 ) && ( !isset( $dbchanges['last_touched_ts'] ) ) )
4939          { // Update last_touched_ts field only if it wasn't updated yet and the datemodified will be updated for sure.
4940              global $localtimenow;
4941              $this->set_param( 'last_touched_ts', 'date', date('Y-m-d H:i:s',$localtimenow) );
4942          }
4943  
4944          if( $result = ( parent::dbupdate( $auto_track_modification ) !== false ) )
4945          { // We could update the item object:
4946  
4947              // Let's handle the extracats:
4948              $result = $this->insert_update_extracats( 'update' );
4949  
4950              if( $result )
4951              { // Let's handle the tags:
4952                  $this->insert_update_tags( 'update' );
4953              }
4954  
4955              // Let's handle the slugs:
4956              // TODO: dh> $result handling here feels wrong: when it's true already, it should not become false (add "|| $result"?)
4957              // asimo>dh The result handling is in a transaction. If somehow the new slug creation fails, then the item insertion should rollback either
4958              if( $result && !empty( $edited_slugs ) )
4959              { // if we have new created $edited_slugs, we have to insert it into the database:
4960                  foreach( $edited_slugs as $edited_Slug )
4961                  {
4962                      if( $edited_Slug->ID == 0 )
4963                      { // Insert only new created slugs
4964                          $edited_Slug->dbinsert();
4965                      }
4966                  }
4967                  if( isset( $edited_slugs[0] ) && $edited_slugs[0]->ID > 0 )
4968                  { // Make first slug from list as main slug for this item
4969                      $this->set( 'canonical_slug_ID', $edited_slugs[0]->ID );
4970                      $this->set( 'urltitle', $edited_slugs[0]->get( 'title' ) );
4971                      $result = parent::dbupdate();
4972                  }
4973              }
4974          }
4975  
4976          if( $result === false )
4977          { // Update failed
4978              $DB->rollback();
4979          }
4980          else
4981          { // Update was successful
4982              $this->delete_prerendered_content();
4983  
4984              $DB->commit();
4985  
4986              $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterItemUpdate', $params = array( 'Item' => & $this, 'dbchanges' => $dbchanges ) );
4987          }
4988  
4989          // Load the blog we're in:
4990          $Blog = & $this->get_Blog();
4991  
4992          // BLOCK CACHE INVALIDATION:
4993          BlockCache::invalidate_key( 'cont_coll_ID', $Blog->ID ); // Content has changed
4994  
4995          // set_coll_ID // Settings have not changed
4996  
4997          return $result;
4998      }
4999  
5000  
5001      /**
5002       * Create new slugs with validated title
5003       * !!!private!!! This function should be called only from Item dbupdate() function
5004       * @private
5005       * @return array Slug objects
5006       */
5007  	function update_slugs( $urltitle = NULL )
5008      {
5009          if( ! isset( $urltitle ) )
5010          {
5011              $urltitle = $this->urltitle;
5012          }
5013  
5014          // Split slugs by comma
5015          $urltitles = explode( ',', $urltitle );
5016  
5017          $edited_slugs = array();
5018          foreach( $urltitles as $urltitle )
5019          {
5020              $urltitle = trim( $urltitle );
5021  
5022              // create new slug
5023              $new_Slug = new Slug();
5024              // urltitle_validate may modify the urltitle !!!
5025              $new_Slug->set( 'title', urltitle_validate( $urltitle, $this->title, $this->ID, false, $new_Slug->dbprefix.'title', $new_Slug->dbprefix.'itm_ID', $new_Slug->dbtablename, $this->locale ) );
5026              $new_Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
5027              $new_Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
5028  
5029              // Check if this slug was already used by this item or not.
5030              // We need this check, because urltitle_validate() function will modify an existing urltitle only if it belongs to a different object
5031              $SlugCache = & get_SlugCache();
5032              $prev_Slug = $SlugCache->get_by_name( $new_Slug->get('title'), false, false );
5033              if( $prev_Slug )
5034              { // A slug with this title already exists. It must belong to the same item!
5035                  if( $prev_Slug->get('itm_ID') == $new_Slug->get('itm_ID') )
5036                  {
5037                      $edited_slugs[] = $prev_Slug;
5038                      continue;
5039                  }
5040                  else
5041                  { // This case should never happen, because urltitle validate check this case. It is only an extra check.
5042                      debug_die('The slugs table is broken');
5043                  }
5044              }
5045              else
5046              { // No slug with such urltitle in DB, we can add this new one
5047                  $edited_slugs[] = $new_Slug;
5048              }
5049          }
5050  
5051          return $edited_slugs;
5052      }

5055      /**
5056       * Trigger event AfterItemDelete after calling parent method.
5057       *
5058       * @todo fp> delete related stuff: comments, cats, file links...
5059       *
5060       * @return boolean true on success
5061       */
5062  	function dbdelete()
5063      {
5064          global $DB, $Plugins;
5065  
5066          // Get list of comments that are going to be deleted
5067          $comments_list = implode( ',', $DB->get_col( '
5068              SELECT comment_ID
5069                FROM T_comments
5070               WHERE comment_item_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) ) );
5071  
5072          // remember ID, because parent method resets it to 0
5073          $old_ID = $this->ID;
5074  
5075          // Load the blog
5076          $Blog = & $this->get_Blog();
5077  
5078          $DB->begin();
5079  
5080          if( $r = parent::dbdelete() )
5081          {
5082              // re-set the ID for the Plugin event & for a deleting of the prerendered content
5083              $this->ID = $old_ID;
5084  
5085              $this->delete_prerendered_content();
5086  
5087              if( !empty( $comments_list ) )
5088              {    // Delete dependencies of the comments
5089                  $DB->query( "DELETE FROM T_comments__votes
5090                    WHERE cmvt_cmt_ID IN ($comments_list)" );
5091              }
5092  
5093              $DB->commit();
5094  
5095              $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterItemDelete', $params = array( 'Item' => & $this ) );
5096  
5097              $this->ID = 0;
5098  
5099              // BLOCK CACHE INVALIDATION:
5100              BlockCache::invalidate_key( 'cont_coll_ID', $Blog->ID ); // Content has changed
5101  
5102              // set_coll_ID // Settings have not changed
5103          }
5104          else
5105          {
5106              $DB->rollback();
5107          }
5108  
5109          return $r;
5110      }

5113      /**
5114       * Quick and dirty "excerpts should not stay empty".
5115       *
5116       * @todo have a maxlength param for excerpts in blog properties
5117       * @todo crop at word boundary, maybe even sentence boundary.
5118       *       This should get added to strmaxlen probably.
5119       *
5120       * @param integer Crop length
5121       * @param string Suffix, if cropped
5122       * @return boolean true if excerpt has been changed
5123       */
5124  	function update_excerpt( $crop_length = 254, $suffix = '&hellip;' )
5125      {
5126          if( empty($this->excerpt) || $this->excerpt_autogenerated )
5127          {    // We want to regenrate the excerpt from the content:
5128              $excerpt = $this->get_autogenerated_excerpt($crop_length, $suffix);
5129  
5130              if( !empty($excerpt) )
5131              {    // We have something to act as an excerpt...
5132                  $this->set( 'excerpt', $excerpt );
5133                  $this->set( 'excerpt_autogenerated', 1 );
5134                  return true;
5135              }
5136          }
5137  
5138          return false;
5139      }
5140  
5141  
5142      /**
5143       * Get autogenerated excerpt, derived from {@link Item::$content}.
5144       *
5145       * @param integer Crop length
5146       * @param string Suffix, if cropped
5147       * @return string
5148       */
5149  	function get_autogenerated_excerpt( $crop_length = 254, $suffix = '&hellip;' )
5150      {
5151          // autogenerated excerpt should NEVER show anything after [teaserbreak] or after [pagebreak]
5152          $content_parts = $this->get_content_parts( array( 'disppage' => 1 ) );
5153          $excerpt_content = array_shift( $content_parts );
5154          $r = str_replace( '<p>', ' <p>', $excerpt_content );
5155          $r = str_replace( '<br', ' <br', $excerpt_content );
5156          $r = trim(strip_tags($r));
5157          // fp> this is borked: $r = preg_replace('~(\r?\n)+~', '\n', $r);
5158          $r = trim($r);
5159          $r = strmaxlen( $r, $crop_length, $suffix, 'raw', true );
5160          return $r;
5161      }

5164      /**
5165       * Insert/Update post extracats
5166       *
5167       * @param string 'insert' | 'update'
5168       * @return boolean true on success | false one failure
5169       */
5170  	function insert_update_extracats( $mode )
5171      {
5172          global $DB, $Messages;
5173  
5174          if( ! is_null( $this->extra_cat_IDs ) )
5175          { // Okay the extra cats are defined:
5176              $DB->begin( 'SERIALIZABLE' );
5177  
5178              $meta_count = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT count( cat_ID ) FROM T_categories WHERE cat_meta = 1 AND cat_ID IN ('.implode( ',', $this->extra_cat_IDs ).')' );
5179              if( $meta_count > 0 )
5180              {
5181                  $DB->rollback();
5182                  $Messages->add( T_('Could not set the selected categories!'), 'error' );
5183                  return false;
5184              }
5185              if( $mode == 'update' )
5186              {
5187                  // delete previous extracats:
5188                  $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_postcats WHERE postcat_post_ID = '.$this->ID, 'delete previous extracats' );
5189              }
5190  
5191              // insert new extracats:
5192              $query = "INSERT INTO T_postcats( postcat_post_ID, postcat_cat_ID ) VALUES ";
5193              foreach( $this->extra_cat_IDs as $extra_cat_ID )
5194              {
5195                  //echo "extracat: $extracat_ID <br />";
5196                  $query .= "( $this->ID, $extra_cat_ID ),";
5197              }
5198              $query = substr( $query, 0, strlen( $query ) - 1 );
5199              $DB->query( $query, 'insert new extracats' );
5200  
5201              $DB->commit();
5202          }
5203  
5204          return true;
5205      }

5208      /**
5209       * Save tags to DB
5210       *
5211       * @param string 'insert' | 'update'
5212       */
5213  	function insert_update_tags( $mode )
5214      {
5215          global $DB;
5216  
5217          if( isset( $this->tags ) )
5218          { // Okay the tags are defined:
5219  
5220              $DB->begin();
5221  
5222              if( $mode == 'update' )
5223              {    // delete previous tag associations:
5224                  // Note: actual tags never get deleted
5225                  $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_items__itemtag
5226                                              WHERE itag_itm_ID = '.$this->ID, 'delete previous tags' );
5227              }
5228  
5229              if( !empty($this->tags) )
5230              {
5231                  // Find the tags that are already in the DB
5232                  $query = 'SELECT LOWER( tag_name )
5233                                          FROM T_items__tag
5234                                       WHERE tag_name IN ('.$DB->quote($this->tags).')';
5235                  $existing_tags = $DB->get_col( $query, 0, 'Find existing tags' );
5236  
5237                  $new_tags = array_diff( array_map('evo_strtolower', $this->tags), $existing_tags );
5238  
5239                  if( !empty( $new_tags ) )
5240                  {    // insert new tags:
5241                      $query = "INSERT INTO T_items__tag( tag_name ) VALUES ";
5242                      foreach( $new_tags as $tag )
5243                      {
5244                          $query .= '( '.$DB->quote($tag).' ),';
5245                      }
5246                      $query = substr( $query, 0, strlen( $query ) - 1 );
5247                      $DB->query( $query, 'insert new tags' );
5248                  }
5249  
5250                  // ASSOC:
5251                  $query = 'INSERT INTO T_items__itemtag( itag_itm_ID, itag_tag_ID )
5252                                    SELECT '.$this->ID.', tag_ID
5253                                        FROM T_items__tag
5254                                       WHERE tag_name IN ('.$DB->quote($this->tags).')';
5255                  $DB->query( $query, 'Make tag associations!' );
5256              }
5257  
5258              $DB->commit();
5259          }
5260      }

5330  
5331      /**
5332       * Execute or schedule post(=after) processing tasks
5333       *
5334       * Includes notifications & pings
5335       *
5336       * @param boolean a new post was just created or it was called after an update
5337       * @param boolean give more info messages (we want to avoid that when we save & continue editing)
5338       */
5339  	function handle_post_processing( $just_created, $verbose = true )
5340      {
5341          global $Settings, $Messages, $localtimenow, $posttypes_nopermanentURL;
5342  
5343          if( $just_created )
5344          { // we must try to send moderation notifications for the newly created posts
5345              $already_notified = $this->send_moderation_emails();
5346          }
5347          else
5348          { // Moderation notifications were not sent, so there are no already notified users
5349              $already_notified = NULL;
5350          }
5351  
5352          $notifications_mode = $Settings->get('outbound_notifications_mode');
5353  
5354          if( $notifications_mode == 'off' )
5355          {    // Exit silently
5356              return false;
5357          }
5358  
5359          if( $this->notifications_status == 'finished' )
5360          { // pings have been done before
5361              if( $verbose )
5362              {
5363                  $Messages->add( T_('Post had already pinged: skipping notifications...'), 'note' );
5364              }
5365              return false;
5366          }
5367  
5368          if( $this->notifications_status != 'noreq' )
5369          { // pings have been done before
5370  
5371              // TODO: Check if issue_date has changed and reschedule
5372              if( $verbose )
5373              {
5374                  $Messages->add( T_('Post processing already pending...'), 'note' );
5375              }
5376              return false;
5377          }
5378  
5379          if( $this->status != 'published' )
5380          {
5381              // TODO: discard any notification that may be pending!
5382              if( $verbose )
5383              {
5384                  $Messages->add( T_('Post not publicly published: skipping notifications...'), 'note' );
5385              }
5386              return false;
5387          }
5388  
5389          if( in_array( $this->ptyp_ID, $posttypes_nopermanentURL ) )
5390          {
5391              // TODO: discard any notification that may be pending!
5392              if( $verbose )
5393              {
5394                  $Messages->add( T_('This post type doesn\'t need notifications...'), 'note' );
5395              }
5396              return false;
5397          }
5398  
5399          if( $notifications_mode == 'immediate' && strtotime( $this->issue_date ) <= $localtimenow )
5400          {    // We want to do the post processing immediately:
5401              // send outbound pings:
5402              $this->send_outbound_pings( $verbose );
5403  
5404              // Send email notifications now!
5405              $this->send_email_notifications( false, $already_notified );
5406  
5407              // Record that processing has been done:
5408              $this->set( 'notifications_status', 'finished' );
5409          }
5410          else
5411          {    // We want asynchronous post processing. This applies to posts with date in future too.
5412              $Messages->add( T_('Scheduling asynchronous notifications...'), 'note' );
5413  
5414              // CREATE OBJECT:
5415              load_class( '/cron/model/_cronjob.class.php', 'Cronjob' );
5416              $edited_Cronjob = new Cronjob();
5417  
5418              // start datetime. We do not want to ping before the post is effectively published:
5419              $edited_Cronjob->set( 'start_datetime', $this->issue_date );
5420  
5421              // no repeat.
5422  
5423              // name:
5424              $edited_Cronjob->set( 'name', sprintf( T_('Send notifications for &laquo;%s&raquo;'), strip_tags($this->title) ) );
5425  
5426              // controller:
5427              $edited_Cronjob->set( 'controller', 'cron/jobs/_post_notifications.job.php' );
5428  
5429              // params: specify which post this job is supposed to send notifications for:
5430              $edited_Cronjob->set( 'params', array( 'item_ID' => $this->ID ) );
5431  
5432              // Save cronjob to DB:
5433              $edited_Cronjob->dbinsert();
5434  
5435              // Memorize the cron job ID which is going to handle this post:
5436              $this->set( 'notifications_ctsk_ID', $edited_Cronjob->ID );
5437  
5438              // Record that processing has been scheduled:
5439              $this->set( 'notifications_status', 'todo' );
5440          }
5441  
5442          // Save the new processing status to DB
5443          $this->dbupdate();
5444  
5445          return true;
5446      }
5447  
5448  
5449      /**
5450       * Send post may need moderation notifications for those users who have rights to moderate this post, and would like to receive notifications
5451       *
5452       * @return array the notified user ids
5453       */
5454  	function send_moderation_emails()
5455      {
5456          global $Settings, $UserSettings, $DB;
5457  
5458          // Select all users who are post moderators in this Item's blog
5459          $blog_ID = $this->load_Blog();
5460  
5461          $notify_condition = 'uset_value IS NOT NULL AND uset_value <> "0"';
5462          if( $Settings->get( 'def_notify_post_moderation' ) )
5463          {
5464              $notify_condition = '( uset_value IS NULL OR ( '.$notify_condition.' ) )';
5465          }
5466  
5467          // Select user_ids with the corresponding item edit permission on this item's blog
5468          $SQL = new SQL();
5469          $SQL->SELECT( 'user_ID, IF( grp_perm_blogs = "editall" OR user_ID = blog_owner_user_ID, "all", IF( IFNULL( bloguser_perm_edit + 0, 0 ) > IFNULL( bloggroup_perm_edit + 0, 0 ), bloguser_perm_edit, bloggroup_perm_edit ) ) as perm' );
5470          $SQL->FROM( 'T_users' );
5471          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_blogs ON ( blog_ID = '.$this->blog_ID.' )' );
5472          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_coll_user_perms ON (blog_advanced_perms <> 0 AND user_ID = bloguser_user_ID AND bloguser_blog_ID = '.$this->blog_ID.' )' );
5473          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_coll_group_perms ON (blog_advanced_perms <> 0 AND user_grp_ID = bloggroup_group_ID AND bloggroup_blog_ID = '.$this->blog_ID.' )' );
5474          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_users__usersettings ON uset_user_ID = user_ID AND uset_name = "notify_post_moderation"' );
5475          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_groups ON grp_ID = user_grp_ID' );
5476          $SQL->WHERE( $notify_condition );
5477          $SQL->WHERE_and( '( bloguser_perm_edit IS NOT NULL AND bloguser_perm_edit <> "no" AND bloguser_perm_edit <> "own" )
5478                  OR ( bloggroup_perm_edit IS NOT NULL AND bloggroup_perm_edit <> "no" AND bloggroup_perm_edit <> "own" )
5479                  OR ( grp_perm_blogs = "editall" ) OR ( user_ID = blog_owner_user_ID )' );
5480  
5481          $post_moderators = $DB->get_assoc( $SQL->get() );
5482  
5483          $post_creator_User = & $this->get_creator_User();
5484          if( isset( $post_moderators[$post_creator_User->ID] ) )
5485          { // Don't notify the user who just created this Item
5486              unset( $post_moderators[$post_creator_User->ID] );
5487          }
5488  
5489          if( empty( $post_moderators ) )
5490          { // There are no moderator users who would like to receive notificaitons
5491              return NULL;
5492          }
5493  
5494          // Collect all notified User ID in this array
5495          $notfied_Users = array();
5496  
5497          $post_creator_level = $post_creator_User->level;
5498          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
5499          $UserCache->load_list( array_keys( $post_moderators ) );
5500  
5501          foreach( $post_moderators as $moderator_ID => $perm )
5502          {
5503              $moderator_User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $moderator_ID );
5504              if( ( $perm == 'lt' ) && ( $moderator_User->level <= $post_creator_level ) )
5505              { // User has no permission moderate this post
5506                  continue;
5507              }
5508              if( ( $perm == 'le' ) && ( $moderator_User->level < $post_creator_level ) )
5509              { // User has no permission moderate this post
5510                  continue;
5511              }
5512  
5513              $moderator_user_Group = $moderator_User->get_Group();
5514              $notify_full = $moderator_user_Group->check_perm( 'post_moderation_notif', 'full' );
5515  
5516              $email_template_params = array(
5517                  'locale'         => $moderator_User->locale,
5518                  'notify_full'    => $notify_full,
5519                  'Item'           => $this,
5520                  'recipient_User' => $moderator_User,
5521                  'notify_type'    => 'moderator',
5522              );
5523  
5524              locale_temp_switch( $moderator_User->locale );
5525              $subject = T_('New post may need moderation:').' '.sprintf( T_('%s created a new post on "%s"'), $post_creator_User->login, $this->Blog->get('shortname') );
5526              // Send the email
5527              send_mail_to_User( $moderator_ID, $subject, 'post_new', $email_template_params, false, array( 'Reply-To' => $post_creator_User->email ) );
5528              locale_restore_previous();
5529  
5530              // A send notification email request to the user with $moderator_ID ID was processed
5531              $notfied_Users[] = $moderator_ID;
5532          }
5533  
5534          return $notfied_Users;
5535      }
5536  
5537  
5538      /**
5539       * Send email notifications to subscribed users
5540       *
5541       * @todo fp>> shall we notify suscribers of blog were this is in extra-cat? blueyed>> IMHO yes.
5542       *
5543       * @param boolean Display notification messages or not
5544       * @param array Already notified user ids, or NULL if it is not the case
5545       */
5546  	function send_email_notifications( $display = true, $already_notified = NULL )
5547      {
5548          global $DB, $admin_url, $baseurl, $debug, $Debuglog;
5549  
5550          $edited_Blog = & $this->get_Blog();
5551  
5552          if( ! $edited_Blog->get_setting( 'allow_subscriptions' ) )
5553          {    // Subscriptions not enabled!
5554              return;
5555          }
5556  
5557          if( $display )
5558          {
5559              echo "<div class=\"panelinfo\">\n";
5560              echo '<h3>', T_('Notifying subscribed users...'), "</h3>\n";
5561          }
5562  
5563          // Create condition to not select already notified modertor users
5564          $except_users_condition = empty( $already_notified ) ? '' : ' AND sub_user_ID NOT IN ( '.implode( ',', $already_notified ).' )';
5565  
5566          // Get list of users who want to be notfied:
5567          // TODO: also use extra cats/blogs??
5568          $sql = 'SELECT DISTINCT sub_user_ID
5569                              FROM T_subscriptions
5570                          WHERE sub_coll_ID = '.$this->get_blog_ID().'
5571                              AND sub_items <> 0'.$except_users_condition;
5572          $notify_users = $DB->get_col( $sql );
5573  
5574          if( empty( $notify_users ) )
5575          { // No-one to notify:
5576              if( $display )
5577              {
5578                  echo '<p>', T_('No-one to notify.'), "</p>\n</div>\n";
5579              }
5580              return false;
5581          }
5582  
5583          // Load all users who will be notified
5584          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
5585          $UserCache->load_list( $notify_users );
5586  
5587          /*
5588           * We have a list of user IDs to notify:
5589           */
5590          $this->get_creator_User();
5591  
5592          // Load a list with the blocked emails in cache
5593          load_blocked_emails( $notify_users );
5594  
5595          // Send emails:
5596          $cache_by_locale = array();
5597          foreach( $notify_users as $user_ID )
5598          {
5599              $notify_User = $UserCache->get_by_ID( $user_ID, false, false );
5600              if( empty( $notify_User ) )
5601              { // skip invalid users
5602                  continue;
5603              }
5604  
5605              $notify_email = $notify_User->get( 'email' );
5606              if( empty( $notify_email ) )
5607              { // skip users with empty email address
5608                  continue;
5609              }
5610              $notify_locale = $notify_User->get( 'locale' );
5611              $notify_user_Group = $notify_User->get_Group();
5612  
5613              $notify_full = $notify_user_Group->check_perm( 'post_subscription_notif', 'full' );
5614              if( ! isset($cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]) )
5615              { // No message for this locale generated yet:
5616                  locale_temp_switch( $notify_locale );
5617  
5618                  $cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]['subject']['short'] = sprintf( T_('%s created a new post in blog "%s"'), $this->creator_User->get( 'login' ), $edited_Blog->get('shortname') );
5619  
5620                  $cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]['subject']['full'] = sprintf( T_('[%s] New post: "%s"'), $edited_Blog->get('shortname'), $this->get('title') );
5621  
5622                  locale_restore_previous();
5623              }
5624  
5625              $email_template_params = array(
5626                      'locale'         => $notify_locale,
5627                      'notify_full'    => $notify_full,
5628                      'Item'           => $this,
5629                      'recipient_User' => $notify_User,
5630                      'notify_type'    => 'subscription',
5631                  );
5632  
5633              if( $display ) echo T_('Notifying:').$notify_email."<br />\n";
5634              if( $debug >= 2 )
5635              {
5636                  $message_content = mail_template( 'post_new', 'txt', $email_template_params );
5637                  echo "<p>Sending notification to $notify_email:<pre>$message_content</pre>";
5638              }
5639  
5640              $subject_type = $notify_full ? 'full' : 'short';
5641              send_mail_to_User( $user_ID, $cache_by_locale[$notify_locale]['subject'][$subject_type], 'post_new', $email_template_params );
5642  
5643              blocked_emails_memorize( $notify_User->email );
5644          }
5645  
5646          blocked_emails_display();
5647  
5648          if( $display ) echo '<p>', T_('Done.'), "</p>\n</div>\n";
5649      }

5652      /**
5653       * Send outbound pings for a post
5654       *
5655       * @param boolean give more info messages (we want to avoid that when we save & continue editing)
5656       */
5657  	function send_outbound_pings( $verbose = true )
5658      {
5659          global $Plugins, $baseurl, $Messages, $evonetsrv_host, $test_pings_for_real;
5660  
5661          load_funcs('xmlrpc/model/_xmlrpc.funcs.php');
5662  
5663          $this->load_Blog();
5664          $ping_plugins = trim( $this->Blog->get_setting( 'ping_plugins' ) );
5665          $ping_plugins = empty( $ping_plugins ) ? array() :  array_unique( explode( ',', $this->Blog->get_setting( 'ping_plugins' ) ) );
5666  
5667          // init result
5668          $r = true;
5669  
5670          if( (preg_match( '#^http://localhost[/:]#', $baseurl)
5671                  || preg_match( '~^\w+://[^/]+\.local/~', $baseurl ) ) /* domain ending in ".local" */
5672              && $evonetsrv_host != 'localhost'    // OK if we are pinging locally anyway ;)
5673              && empty($test_pings_for_real) )
5674          {
5675              if( $verbose )
5676              {
5677                  $Messages->add( T_('Skipping pings (Running on localhost).'), 'note' );
5678              }
5679              return false;
5680          }
5681          else foreach( $ping_plugins as $plugin_code )
5682          {
5683              $Plugin = & $Plugins->get_by_code($plugin_code);
5684  
5685              if( $Plugin )
5686              {
5687                  $Messages->add( sprintf(T_('Pinging %s...'), $Plugin->ping_service_name), 'note' );
5688                  $params = array( 'Item' => & $this, 'xmlrpcresp' => NULL, 'display' => false );
5689  
5690                  $r = $r && ( $Plugin->ItemSendPing( $params ) );
5691  
5692                  if( !empty($params['xmlrpcresp']) )
5693                  {
5694                      if( is_a($params['xmlrpcresp'], 'xmlrpcresp') )
5695                      {
5696                          // dh> TODO: let xmlrpc_displayresult() handle $Messages (e.g. "error", but should be connected/after the "Pinging %s..." from above)
5697                          ob_start();
5698                          xmlrpc_displayresult( $params['xmlrpcresp'], true );
5699                          $Messages->add( ob_get_contents(), 'note' );
5700                          ob_end_clean();
5701                      }
5702                      else
5703                      {
5704                          $Messages->add( $params['xmlrpcresp'], 'note' );
5705                      }
5706                  }
5707              }
5708          }
5709          return $r;
5710      }

5713      /**
5714       * Callback user for footer()
5715       */
5716  	function replace_callback( $matches )
5717      {
5718          switch( $matches[1] )
5719          {
5720              case 'perm_url':
5721              case 'item_perm_url':
5722                  return $this->get_permanent_url();
5723  
5724              case 'title':
5725              case 'item_title':
5726                  return $this->title;
5727  
5728              case 'excerpt':
5729                  return $this->get_excerpt2();
5730  
5731              case 'author':
5732                  return $this->get('t_author');
5733  
5734              case 'author_login':
5735                  return $this->get_creator_login();
5736  
5737              default:
5738                  return $matches[1];
5739          }
5740      }

5742      /**
5743       * Get a member param by its name
5744       *
5745       * @param mixed Name of parameter
5746       * @return mixed Value of parameter
5747       */
5748  	function get( $parname )
5749      {
5750          switch( $parname )
5751          {
5752              case 't_author':
5753                  // Text: author
5754                  $this->get_creator_User();
5755                  return $this->creator_User->get( 'preferredname' );
5756  
5757              case 't_assigned_to':
5758                  // Text: assignee
5759                  if( ! $this->get_assigned_User() )
5760                  {
5761                      return '';
5762                  }
5763                  return $this->assigned_User->get( 'preferredname' );
5764  
5765              case 't_status':
5766                  // Text status:
5767                  $post_statuses = get_visibility_statuses();
5768                  return $post_statuses[$this->status];
5769  
5770              case 't_extra_status':
5771                  $ItemStatusCache = & get_ItemStatusCache();
5772                  if( ! ($Element = & $ItemStatusCache->get_by_ID( $this->pst_ID, true, false ) ) )
5773                  { // No status:
5774                      return '';
5775                  }
5776                  return $Element->get_name();
5777  
5778              case 't_type':
5779                  // Item type (name):
5780                  if( empty($this->ptyp_ID) )
5781                  {
5782                      return '';
5783                  }
5784  
5785                  $ItemTypeCache = & get_ItemTypeCache();
5786                  $type_Element = & $ItemTypeCache->get_by_ID( $this->ptyp_ID );
5787                  return $type_Element->get_name();
5788  
5789              case 't_priority':
5790                  return $this->priorities[ $this->priority ];
5791  
5792              case 'pingsdone':
5793                  // Deprecated by fp 2006-08-21
5794                  return ($this->post_notifications_status == 'finished');
5795  
5796              case 'excerpt':
5797                  return $this->get_excerpt2();
5798          }
5799  
5800          return parent::get( $parname );
5801      }

5815                  SELECT cat_ID
5816                      FROM T_categories
5817                   WHERE cat_blog_ID = '.$collection_ID.'
5818                   ORDER BY cat_ID ASC
5819                   LIMIT 1' );

5831      {
5832          return explode( '.', $this->renderers );

5836      /**
5837       * Get the list of validated renderers for this Item. This includes stealth plugins etc.
5838       * @return array List of validated renderer codes
5839       */
5840  	function get_renderers_validated()
5841      {
5842          if( ! isset($this->renderers_validated) )
5843          {
5844              global $Plugins;
5845              $this->renderers_validated = $Plugins->validate_renderer_list( $this->get_renderers(), array( 'Item' => & $this ) );
5846          }
5847          return $this->renderers_validated;
5848      }

5850  
5851      /**
5852       * Add a renderer (by code) to the Item.
5853       * @param string Renderer code to add for this item
5854       * @return boolean True if renderers have changed
5855       */
5856  	function add_renderer( $renderer_code )
5857      {
5858          $renderers = $this->get_renderers();
5859          if( in_array( $renderer_code, $renderers ) )
5860          {
5861              return false;
5862          }
5863  
5864          $renderers[] = $renderer_code;
5865          $this->set_renderers( $renderers );
5866  
5867          $this->renderers_validated = NULL;
5868          return true;
5869      }
5870  
5871  
5872      /**
5873       * Remove a renderer (by code) from the Item.
5874       * @param string Renderer code to remove for this item
5875       * @return boolean True if renderers have changed
5876       */
5877  	function remove_renderer( $renderer_code )
5878      {
5879          $r = false;
5880          $renderers = $this->get_renderers();
5881          while( ( $key = array_search( $renderer_code, $renderers ) ) !== false )
5882          {
5883              $r = true;
5884              unset($renderers[$key]);
5885          }
5886  
5887          if( $r )
5888          {
5889              $this->set_renderers( $renderers );
5890              $this->renderers_validated = NULL;
5891              //echo 'Removed renderer '.$renderer_code;
5892          }
5893          return $r;
5894      }

5897      /**
5898       * Get a list of item IDs from $MainList and $ItemList, if they are loaded.
5899       * This is used for prefetching item related data for the whole list(s).
5900       * This will at least return the item's ID itself.
5901       * @return array
5902       */
5903  	function get_prefetch_itemlist_IDs()
5904      {
5905          global $MainList, $ItemList;
5906  
5907          // Add the current ID to the list to prefetch, if it's not in the MainList/ItemList (e.g. featured item).
5908          $r = array($this->ID);
5909  
5910          if( $MainList )
5911          {
5912              $r = array_merge($r, $MainList->get_page_ID_array());
5913          }
5914          if( $ItemList )
5915          {
5916              $r = array_merge($r, $ItemList->get_page_ID_array());
5917          }
5918  
5919          return array_unique( $r );
5920      }

5923      /**
5924       * Get the item tinyslug. If not exists -> create new
5925       *
5926       * @return string|boolean tinyslug on success, false otherwise
5927       */
5928  	function get_tinyslug()
5929      {
5930          global $preview;
5931  
5932          $tinyslug_ID = $this->tiny_slug_ID;
5933          if( $tinyslug_ID != NULL )
5934          { // the tiny slug for this item was already created
5935              $SlugCache = & get_SlugCache();
5936              $Slug = & $SlugCache->get_by_ID( $tinyslug_ID, false, false );
5937              return $Slug === false ? false : $Slug->get( 'title' );
5938          }
5939          elseif( ( $this->ID > 0 ) && ( ! $preview ) )
5940          { // create new tiny Slug for this item
5941              // Note: This may happen only in case of posts created before the tiny slug was introduced
5942              global $DB;
5943              load_funcs( 'slugs/model/_slug.funcs.php' );
5944  
5945              $Slug = new Slug();
5946              $Slug->set( 'title', getnext_tinyurl() );
5947              $Slug->set( 'itm_ID', $this->ID );
5948              $Slug->set( 'type', 'item' );
5949              $DB->begin();
5950              if( ! $Slug->dbinsert() )
5951              { // Slug dbinsert failed
5952                  $DB->rollback();
5953                  return false;
5954              }
5955              $this->set( 'tiny_slug_ID', $Slug->ID );
5956  
5957              // Update Item preserving mod date:
5958              if( ! $this->dbupdate( false ) )
5959              { // Item dbupdate failed
5960                  $DB->rollback();
5961                  return false;
5962              }
5963              $DB->commit();
5964  
5965              // update last tinyurl value on database
5966              // Note: This doesn't have to be part of the above transaction, no problem if it doesn't succeed to update, or if override a previously updated value.
5967              global $Settings;
5968              $Settings->set( 'tinyurl', $Slug->get( 'title' ) );
5969              $Settings->dbupdate();
5970  
5971              return $Slug->get( 'title' );
5972          }
5973  
5974          return false;
5975      }
5976  
5977  
5978      /**
5979       * Get all slugs of this Item, except of tiny slug
5980       *
5981       * @param string Separator
5982       * @return string Slugs list
5983       */
5984  	function get_slugs( $separator = ', ' )
5985      {
5986          if( empty( $this->ID ) )
5987          { // New creating Item
5988              return $this->get('urltitle');
5989          }
5990  
5991          global $DB;
5992          $SQL = new SQL( 'Get slugs of the Item' );
5993          $SQL->SELECT( 'slug_title, IF( slug_ID = '.intval( $this->canonical_slug_ID ).', 0, slug_ID ) AS slug_order_num' );
5994          $SQL->FROM( 'T_slug' );
5995          $SQL->WHERE( 'slug_itm_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
5996          if( !empty( $this->tiny_slug_ID ) )
5997          { // Exclude tiny slug from list
5998              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'slug_ID != '.$DB->quote( $this->tiny_slug_ID ) );
5999          }
6000          $SQL->ORDER_BY( 'slug_order_num' );
6001          $slugs = $DB->get_col( $SQL->get() );
6002  
6003          return implode( $separator, $slugs );
6004      }

6007      /**
6008       * Get the item tiny url
6009       * @return string the tiny url on success, empty string otherwise
6010       */
6011  	function get_tinyurl()
6012      {
6013          if( ( $tinyslug = $this->get_tinyslug() ) == false )
6014          {
6015              return '';
6016          }
6017          $Blog = & $this->get_Blog();
6018          return url_add_tail( $Blog->get( 'url'), '/'.$tinyslug );
6019      }

6022      /**
6023       * Create and return the item tinyurl link.
6024       *
6025       * @param array Params:
6026       *  - 'before': to display before link
6027       *  - 'after': to display after link
6028       *  - 'text': link text
6029       *  - 'title': link title
6030       *  - 'class': class name
6031       *  - 'style': link style
6032       * @return string the tinyurl link on success, empty string otherwise
6033       */
6034  	function get_tinyurl_link( $params = array() )
6035      {
6036          if( ( $tinyslug = $this->get_tinyslug() ) == false )
6037          {
6038              return '';
6039          }
6040  
6041          if( ! $this->ID )
6042          { // preview..
6043              return false;
6044          }
6045  
6046          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
6047          $params = array_merge( array(
6048                  'before'       => ' ',
6049                  'after'        => ' ',
6050                  'text'         => '#',
6051                  'title'        => '#',
6052                  'class'        => '',
6053                  'style'           => '',
6054              ), $params );
6055  
6056          if( $params['title'] == '#' )
6057          {
6058              $params['title'] = T_( 'This is a tinyurl you can copy/paste into twitter, emails and other places where you need a short link to this post' );
6059          }
6060          if( $params['text'] == '#' )
6061          {
6062              $params['text'] = $tinyslug;
6063          }
6064  
6065          $actionurl = $this->get_tinyurl();
6066  
6067          $r = $params['before'];
6068          $r .= '<a href="'.$actionurl;
6069          $r .= '" title="'.$params['title'].'"';
6070          if( !empty( $params['class'] ) ) $r .= ' class="'.$params['class'].'"';
6071          if( !empty( $params['style'] ) ) $r .= ' style="'.$params['style'].'"';
6072          $r .=  '>'.$params['text'].'</a>';
6073          $r .= $params['after'];
6074  
6075          return $r;
6076      }
6077  
6078  
6079      /**
6080       * Display the item tinyurl link
6081       */
6082  	function tinyurl_link( $params = array() )
6083      {
6084          echo $this->get_tinyurl_link( $params );
6085      }

6088      /**
6089       * Get an url to this item
6090       * @param string values:
6091       *         - 'admin_view': url to this item admin interface view
6092       *         - 'public_view': url to this item public interface view (permanent url)
6093       *         - 'edit': url to this item edit screen
6094       * @return string the url if exists, empty string otherwise
6095       */
6096  	function get_url( $type )
6097      {
6098          global $admin_url;
6099          switch( $type )
6100          {
6101              case 'admin_view':
6102                  return $admin_url.'?ctrl=items&amp;blog='.$this->get_blog_ID().'&amp;p='.$this->ID;
6103              case 'public_view':
6104                  return $this->get_permanent_url();
6105              case 'edit':
6106                  return $this->get_edit_url();
6107              default:
6108                  return '';
6109          }
6110      }

6136      /**
6137       * Get the latest Comment on this Item
6138       *
6139       * @param string the status of the latest comment
6140       * @return Comment
6141       */
6142      function & get_latest_Comment( $status = NULL )
6143      {
6144          global $DB;
6145  
6146          if( is_null($this->latest_Comment) )
6147          {
6148              $SQL = new SQL( 'Get the latest Comment on the Item' );
6149              $SQL->SELECT( 'comment_ID' );
6150              $SQL->FROM( 'T_comments' );
6151              $SQL->WHERE( 'comment_item_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
6152              $SQL->ORDER_BY( 'comment_date DESC' );
6153              $SQL->LIMIT( '1' );
6154  
6155              if( $status != NULL )
6156              {
6157                  $SQL->WHERE_and( 'comment_status = '.$DB->quote( $status ) );
6158              }
6159  
6160              if( $comment_ID = $DB->get_var( $SQL->get() ) )
6161              {
6162                  $CommentCache = & get_CommentCache();
6163                  $this->latest_Comment = & $CommentCache->get_by_ID( $comment_ID );
6164              }
6165          }
6166  
6167          return $this->latest_Comment;
6168      }

6170  
6171      /**
6172       * Get the ratings of comments on this item
6173       *
6174       * @retrun array of [ ratings, active ratings ] for this comment
6175       */
6176  	function get_ratings()
6177      {
6178          global $DB, $localtimenow;
6179  
6180          // Count each published comments rating grouped by active/expired status and by rating value
6181          $sql = 'SELECT comment_rating, count( comment_ID ) AS cnt,
6182                      IF( iset_value IS NULL OR iset_value = "" OR TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, comment_date, '.$DB->quote( date2mysql( $localtimenow ) ).') < iset_value, "active", "expired" ) as expiry_status
6183                          FROM T_comments
6184                          LEFT JOIN T_items__item_settings ON iset_item_ID = comment_item_ID AND iset_name = "post_expiry_delay"
6185                          WHERE comment_item_ID = '.$this->ID.' AND comment_status = "published"
6186                          GROUP BY expiry_status, comment_rating
6187                          ORDER BY comment_rating DESC';
6188          $results = $DB->get_results( $sql );
6189  
6190          // init rating arrays
6191          $ratings = array();
6192          $ratings['total'] = 0;
6193          $ratings['summary'] = 0;
6194          $ratings['unrated'] = 0;
6195          $active_ratings = array();
6196          $active_ratings['total'] = 0;
6197          $active_ratings['summary'] = 0;
6198          $active_ratings['unrated'] = 0;
6199  
6200          if( empty( $results ) )
6201          { // No rating at all
6202              $ratings['all_ratings'] = 0;
6203              $active_ratings['all_ratings'] = 0;
6204              return array( $ratings, $active_ratings );
6205          }
6206  
6207          // Init all ratings count to 0
6208          for( $i=5; $i>=1; $i-- )
6209          {
6210              $ratings[$i] = 0;
6211              $active_ratings[$i] = 0;
6212          }
6213  
6214          // Count active and overall rating values
6215          foreach($results as $rating)
6216          {
6217              $index = ( $rating->comment_rating == 0 ) ? 'unrated' : $rating->comment_rating;
6218              $ratings[$index] += $rating->cnt;
6219              $ratings['total'] += $rating->cnt;
6220              $ratings['summary'] += ( $rating->cnt * $rating->comment_rating );
6221              if( $rating->expiry_status == 'active' )
6222              { // this rating is not expired yet
6223                  $active_ratings[$index] = $rating->cnt;
6224                  $active_ratings['total'] += $rating->cnt;
6225                  $active_ratings['summary'] += ( $rating->cnt * $rating->comment_rating );
6226              }
6227          }
6228  
6229          $ratings['all_ratings'] = $ratings['total'] - $ratings['unrated'];
6230          $active_ratings['all_ratings'] = $active_ratings['total'] - $active_ratings['unrated'];
6231  
6232          return array( $ratings, $active_ratings );
6233      }

6303      {

6312

6314          {    // Display location
6315              echo $before;
6316

6318

6434       *
6435       * @param array params
6436       * @return string City name + postcode
6437       */
6438  	function get_city( $params = array() )
6439      {
6440          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
6441          $params = array_merge( array(
6442                  'before' => '',
6443                  'after'  => '',
6444                  'template' => '$name$ ($postcode$)', // $name$ - City name; $postcode$ - City postcode
6445              ), $params );
6446  
6447          $this->load_Blog();
6448          if( $this->city_ID == 0 || ! $this->Blog->city_visible() )
6449          {    // City is not defined for current Item
6450              return;

6454          $CityCache = & get_CityCache();
6455  
6456          if( $City = $CityCache->get_by_ID( $this->city_ID ) )
6457          {    // Display city info
6458              $result = $params['before'];
6459  
6460              $city_tamplates = array( '$name$', '$postcode$' );
6461              $city_data = array( $City->get_name(), $City->get_postcode() );
6462              $result .= str_replace( $city_tamplates, $city_data, $params['template'] );
6463  
6464              $result .= $params['after'];
6465  
6466              return $result;
6467          }
6468      }

6472       * Get item revision
6473       *
6474       * @param integer Revision ID
6475       * @return object Revision
6476       */
6477  	function get_revision( $iver_ID = 0 )
6478      {
6479          if( $iver_ID > 0 )
6480          {    // Get revision from archive
6481              global $DB;
6482  
6483              $revision_SQL = new SQL();
6484              $revision_SQL->SELECT( '*' );
6485              $revision_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__version' );
6486              $revision_SQL->WHERE( 'iver_ID = '.$DB->quote( $iver_ID ) );
6487              $revision_SQL->WHERE_and( 'iver_itm_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
6488              $Revision = $DB->get_row( $revision_SQL->get() );
6489          }
6490          else
6491          {    // Get current version
6492              $Revision = (object) array(
6493                  'iver_ID'            => 0,
6494                  'iver_edit_datetime' => $this->datemodified,
6495                  'iver_edit_user_ID'  => $this->lastedit_user_ID,
6496                  'iver_status'        => $this->status,
6497                  'iver_title'         => $this->title,
6498                  'iver_content'       => $this->content
6499              );
6500          }
6501  
6502          return $Revision;
6503      }

6506      /**
6507       * Check if item is locked
6508       *
6509       * @return boolean TRUE - if item is locked
6510       */
6511  	function is_locked()
6512      {
6513          if( isset( $this->is_locked ) )
6514          { // item lock status was already set
6515              return $this->is_locked;
6516          }
6517  
6518          // Get item chapters to check lock status, but use cached chapters array instead of db query
6519          $item_chapters = $this->get_Chapters();
6520  
6521          if( count( $item_chapters ) )
6522          { // Presuppose that all category is locked, we will change this value if only one category is not locked
6523              $this->is_locked = true;
6524              foreach( $item_chapters as $item_Chapter )
6525              { // Check if all item categories is locked
6526                  if( !$item_Chapter->lock )
6527                  { // This category is not locked so the item is not locked either
6528                      $this->is_locked = false;
6529                      break;
6530                  }
6531              }
6532          }
6533          else
6534          { // If no category was set yet ( e.g. in case of new item create ), the Item can't be locked
6535              $this->is_locked = false;
6536          }
6537  
6538          return $this->is_locked;
6539      }

6542      /**
6543       * Convert inline image tags like [image:123:link title:.css_class_name] into HTML img tags
6544       *
6545       * @param string Source content
6546       * @param array Params
6547       * @return string Content
6548       */
6549  	function render_inline_images( $content, $params = array() )
6550      {
6551          if( isset( $params['check_code_block'] ) && $params['check_code_block'] && ( ( stristr( $content, '<code' ) !== false ) || ( stristr( $content, '<pre' ) !== false ) ) )
6552          { // Call $this->render_inline_images() on everything outside code/pre:
6553              $params['check_code_block'] = false;
6554              $content = callback_on_non_matching_blocks( $content,
6555                  '~<(code|pre)[^>]*>.*?</\1>~is',
6556                  array( $this, 'render_inline_images' ), array( $params ) );
6557              return $content;
6558          }
6559  
6560          // No code/pre blocks, replace on the whole thing
6561  
6562          $params = array_merge( array(
6563                  'before'              => '<div>',
6564                  'before_image'        => '<div class="image_block">',
6565                  'before_image_legend' => '<div class="image_legend">',
6566                  'after_image_legend'  => '</div>',
6567                  'after_image'         => '</div>',
6568                  'after'               => '</div>',
6569                  'image_size'          => 'fit-400x320',
6570                  'image_link_to'       => 'original', // Can be 'orginal' (image) or 'single' (this post)
6571                  'limit'               => 1000, // Max # of images displayed
6572              ), $params );
6573  
6574          // Find all matches with image inline tags
6575          preg_match_all( '/\[image:(\d+)(:?)([^\]]*)\]/i', $content, $images );
6576  
6577          if( !empty( $images[0] ) )
6578          { // There are image inline tags in the content
6579  
6580              if( !isset( $LinkList ) )
6581              { // Get list of attached Links only first time
6582                  $LinkOwner = new LinkItem( $this );
6583                  $LinkList = $LinkOwner->get_attachment_LinkList( $params['limit'], 'inline' );
6584              }
6585  
6586              if( empty( $LinkList ) )
6587              { // This Item has not the inline attached files, Exit here
6588                  return $content;
6589              }
6590  
6591              foreach( $images[0] as $i => $current_link_tag )
6592              {
6593                  $current_link_ID = (int)$images[1][$i];
6594                  if( empty( $current_link_ID ) )
6595                  { // Invalid link ID, Go to next match
6596                      continue;
6597                  }
6598                  if( ! ( $Link = & $LinkList->get_by_field( 'link_ID', $current_link_ID ) ) )
6599                  { // Link is not found by ID
6600                      continue;
6601                  }
6602  
6603                  if( ! ( $File = & $Link->get_File() ) )
6604                  { // No File object
6605                      global $Debuglog;
6606                      $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'Link ID#%d of item #%d does not have a file object!', $Link->ID, $this->ID ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
6607                      continue;
6608                  }
6609  
6610                  if( ! $File->exists() )
6611                  { // File doesn't exist
6612                      global $Debuglog;
6613                      $Debuglog->add( sprintf( 'File linked to item #%d does not exist (%s)!', $this->ID, $File->get_full_path() ), array( 'error', 'files' ) );
6614                      continue;
6615                  }
6616  
6617                  $current_image_params = $params;
6618                  if( ! empty( $images[2][$i] ) )
6619                  {
6620                      // Get image inline params: caption and class
6621                      $inline_params = explode( ':.', $images[3][$i]);
6622  
6623                      if( ! empty( $inline_params[0] ) )
6624                      { // Image caption is set, so overwrite the image link title
6625                          $current_image_params['image_link_title'] = strip_tags( $inline_params[0] );
6626                      }
6627  
6628                      if( ! empty( $inline_params[1] ) )
6629                      { // A class name is set for the image
6630                          $image_extraclass = strip_tags( str_replace( '.', '', $inline_params[1] ) );
6631                          if( preg_match('#^[A-Za-z0-9]+$#', $image_extraclass ) )
6632                          { // Overwrite 'before_image' setting to add an extra class name
6633                              $current_image_params['before_image'] = '<div class="image_block '.$image_extraclass.'">';
6634                              // 'after_image' setting must be also defined, becuase it may be different than the default '</div>'
6635                              $current_image_params['after_image'] = '</div>';
6636                          }
6637                      }
6638                  }
6639  
6640                  if( $File->is_image() )
6641                  { // Generate the IMG tag with all the alt, title and desc if available
6642                      $image_tag = $this->get_attached_image_tag( $Link, $current_image_params );
6643  
6644                      // Replace inline image tag with HTML img tag
6645                      $content = str_replace( $current_link_tag, $image_tag, $content );
6646                  }
6647                  else
6648                  { // Display error if file is not an image
6649                      $content = str_replace( $current_link_tag, '<div class="error">'.sprintf( T_('This file is not image: %s'), $current_link_tag ).'</div>', $content );
6650                  }
6651              }
6652          }
6653  
6654          return $content;
6655      }
